This couldnt be good for the computer components, but also posed a fire risk.Solution: while on windows I installed a program called MacFan (just google it) that after typing in a few commands in the command prompt allowed me to turn up the fan speed indefinitely to significantly cool off the laptop. While in windows the fans aren't correctly utilized according to CPU usage so you'll have to do this process upon each startup. Just search on YouTube "how to install macfan" for thorough instructions.3. Videos on youtube while in windows do not expand fully to the screen, instead leaving black bars on the bottom and right sides.Still haven't solved this. I'd expect adjusting the screen resolution would have an effect but I haven't tried this yet.4. The battery life decreased from 7 hours to about 2.5 hours while on Windows.This couldn't be solved either. It's just how windows works on the Mac. The only solution is to turn the brightness down, etc.5. When I click an icon on the taskbar, its title flashes over it. (not the biggest deal but its annoying)Updated my Nvidia drivers from their website and it solved minor graphics problems.As for my actual review of the MacBook Pro, I am very satisfied. I run both windows 7 and mountain lion on it through bootcamp (helpful detailed instructions can be found on YouTube). That way I have the ability to run all my old games and programs on windows while having the Mac side to use for top notch picture and video editing, plus the App Store. I've always preferred the relative simplicity of Microsoft office 2007 for windows, so I use that.After adjusting trackpad and click settings on the windows side, navigation is easy and fluid. The separated keyboard buttons took some adjusting to but that's not any issue. The screen is bright, clear, and rich while the backlit keyboard helps for typing in dark environments.It's about 2 pounds lighter than my previous laptop and significantly thinner, and what I'd consider to be portable. Ill be using it at college next year and will report back on just how portable it is.Graphics, processing, and RAM are all lightning fast and should be useful in intensive software that ill be using. The only problem I've noticed is that after partitioning the hard drive, startup takes a little longer (around 22 seconds total).The power cord is portable and extendable, while its nice to still have the optical drive, Ethernet port, and card slot. Only having 2 USB ports so close in proximity is a minor issue with larger thumb drives, etc. but I may just purchase a separate hub.All in all, you won't regret buying this. The higher cost will pay off well in a long computer life. Thanks for reading and feel free to ask any questions.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Taylor B
Reviews.Content: FAST, QUITE, AMAZING.I am 17 and took a risk with my savings and finally bought a computer for my senior year in high school. I wanted a computer that was quite, fast, and that had overall great performance. This is it. Why not 5 stars? Well the battery lasts about 5 hours, I think when they mean 7 they mean on the darkest setting etc.... It should be up to 7 hours. Amazing comp, you won't be disappointed, cannot wait to take to college.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Jimmy C. Murray
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my Grandson's Graduation. His first Apple product, He really likes it, just now getting familiar with how to properly operate it. I have several Apple products, love the products.

Reviews.Title: I love this machine!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis B. Mora
Reviews.Content: What can I say about the MacBook Pro that has not been said already. I bought this Mac in order to replace my old Dell laptop. I primarily use the computer for school, but it can easily handle extensive tasks (video editing, photoshop etc.) as well. The battery life is good usually averaging between 6-7 hours. I was surprised to discover that this machine can do gaming also, it runs League of Legends and Team Fortress 2 at 60 FPS on the native 1280x800 resolution. OS X is really great at letting you multi-task with ease. I would recommend increasing the ram in order to increase performance on your machine. I installed a 16GB ram kit from Crucial and I noticed an immediate increase in performance. The backlit keyboard is amazing to type on. I have typed for hours and have yet to feel fatigued. The MacBook Pro is a great product which can meet the needs of the average consumer. For those wondering whether to get the MacBook Air or the Pro I would recommend buying the Pro. The MacBook Pro (non-retina) is easily customizable, just buy a SSD and ram and you will have a blazing fast machine in your hands. I hope this review helps.

Reviews.Title: Exelent
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo
Reviews.Content: I bought it, and I received in time, the Mac was like the ad says. The machine is used, but is like new, i'm very impress. I strongly recomen EZ (the seller). Because I receive the machine, and a I had a question for the password, and they respond me immediately.

Reviews.Title: Amazing laptop!
Reviews.Author: vano
Reviews.Content: I needed a new laptop for school and looked around for a lot of different models. Looked at HP, ASUS, Acer, Sony and a bunch of other ones but could not find I really liked. This MacBook Pro might is pricey but  I wanted to go with a laptop that had great reviews and this was it.Being a Windows user for 10+ years I wasn't sure if I was going to like the Mac operating system. But once I started using it I got the hang of it in less than a day. OS is built really well and easy to use.I installed 8gigs of RAM on it myself (was super easy) and it can handle tons of windows/tabs open, and shows no signs of being slowed down, for when I write my research papers. I am sure it could do just as well with the basic 4gigs of RAM it comes with but for around $50, 8gigs of RAM is a cheap upgrade. Really fast laptop.Laptop looks and feels great. Keyboard responds well to presses. Track pad is amazing. Responds great to touch. Other track pads I have used have been finicky. AMAZING battery life. I can go ~8 hours on a single charge with no keyboard lit and screen lit at 25%If your a student and can spare the money, buy this laptop; you wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: WOW - Love the Apple MacBook Pro!
Reviews.Author: linda l.
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this MacBook Pro, programs, style, size, and the packing.What a surprise when it shipped in one day. Thx, Amazon for the speedy delivery. I stayed up half the night enjoying my new MacBook Pro.

Reviews.Title: perfect graduation gift!
Reviews.Author: carol Sweeney
Reviews.Content: The ultimate graduation gift. It is light weight and the perfect size to carry to class. I will go off to LSU well prepared.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Richard T. Chislett
Reviews.Content: After 25 years living in the PC world, and having my last notebook only lasting 6 months, I decided to go to the dark side and purchase a Mac. The battery life is excellent, the display is excellent, and downloading apps is a  breeze. I would recommend this to any one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome machine.
Reviews.Author: Subjective Objective
Reviews.Content: I am a PhD student, and I need my computer to handle everything from Photoshop to Pymol, and LaTEX to InDesign, and this notebook works perfectly. The battery lasts as advertised (give or take 15-20 minutes), and the entire user experience is very elegant. I like the little quirks of the latest operating system as well (full screen mode!). I had a Powerbook G4 11.6" before, and that little beast lasted nearly 6 years (one battery change, RAM upgraded later), and the build quality on that computer was awesome. I mean I accidentally dropped it multiple times, had minor spills on the keyboard, and it still went strong. Finally, it was slowing down considerably last year, and the fan noise kept getting louder, so I was looking for a new laptop. I have always been a fan of Apple laptop's build quality, and the friendliness of the operating system. I am a proficient user of Windows as well, but I always find that the hardware manufacturers always let the operating system down. I compared the quality of Sony Vaio 15" S series computer at a local Microsoft Store (with Signature), and though the prices for both the Mac and Sony Vaio were very similar, the overall computing experience was far superior on a Mac.I have used this computer for quite a while now, and this computer works very well. No glitches, no hang-ups - nothing but smoothness. I highly recommend this computer to any new buyer. Once this laptop has served its purpose (a few years time, perhaps), I will definitely stick with Macs. I am definitely eyeing the Mac 13.3" with Retina Display.

Reviews.Title: best laptop ever
Reviews.Author: echo
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful to Buy this laptop from Apple and this is the first time for me to use the system Apple and has no regrets about transformative for Apple. this model especially very distinctive by its potentials wonderful lightweight also I transpire this device for those interested in is speed in performance at the expense of screen resolutionas in Retina display.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: B. Stallman
Reviews.Content: Yeah, it's super expensive. I'm pretty sure when I bought it, my bank account went 'ouch!' But it's so worth it! I used to be a solid HP person. I loved the way they ran and wasn't a fan of my sister's Macbook Air. But after one busted computer, and another HP that crashed no less than four times (no joke, it was RIDICULOUS) I decided that an Apple was the way to go. I chose the pro because I definitely wanted the cd drive included with the computer. I LOVE IT! Definitely worth the extra money. It's fast, super user friendly, and easier to personalize. I had to use my old hp shortly after purchasing this and couldn't stand it! Once you go Mac, you won't go back!

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro is exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Woops72
Reviews.Content: I needed to upgrade to Lion but my old platform (MacBook vintage 2008/9) was not upgradable.  It was also suffering from hardware (keyboard) issues, relatively slow performance and shortening battery lifetime.  I chose the MBP over the MacAir because of the extra ports, DVD burner, etc, accepting the extra weight which was not that important to me.  I love the new platform, though it took some getting used to with the Launch Pad and Command Center paradigms.Con:  The only small complaint I have is the power cord attachment to the laptop.  It has a 90 degree bend in it that either requires the cord to bend along (and partially cover) the various ports on the side of the laptop or bend away to the rear which generates a long loop for me the way I plug it it with the possibility of accidentally popping out.Pro:  Besides delivering the higher level performance that I expected of the new platform, the display on the MBP is much better than my old MacBook which had a poor quality display with a waviness I never liked and poor off-angle viewability.

Reviews.Title: A great laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Vikram Jairam
Reviews.Content: Pros: Fast CPU. Upgradeable to 16GB Memory. We also remove the Superdrive and put a 750GB Seagate Momentus XT (Hybrid) Drive in the machine. Performance is great for iOS development and running Windows for essential stuff under bootcamp, or fusion.Cons: Screen resolution. Apple should provide either 1080p or retina display. Should be possible in today's market because LCD's have gotten cheaper. They dont move with the times. the non-retina MBP models have stagnated for too long.

Reviews.Title: VERY POWERFUL MACHINE
Reviews.Author: Mr. S Berry
Reviews.Content: Ok before I purchased this computer last July, I owned an 2009 white MacBook that was an introductory  low end MacBook , it was 2g of ram and 160 gb HDD so going from that to an actual PROFESSIONAL machine is amazing .USB 3.0 is a beast , the 500GB HDD Is amazing and I also SELF upgraded the ram from there stock 4g to an 8gig . My machine is amazing this is my favorite model because the new retina MacBook Pro  is not self upgradable AT ALL . so I enjoyed upgrading my computer on my terms instead of apple overcharging their upgrade on order section.But overall if your a creative type or a business professional this is an absolute MUST BUY as I guarantee satisfaction , great durability , nice software with Mountain Lion , sdx card slot , you will a very happy customer. I have had this computer since early July 2012 and I have had no issues OF ANY KIND . NO BUYERS REGRET OVER HERE.

Reviews.Title: STILL GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Serbin
Reviews.Content: I have a refurbished Black MacBook that I bought in 2007 from the Apple online store. I wanted to explore what the Mac was all about. 6+ years later it's still working just fine, but with a limit of 2 gig of RAM, it was getting a bit slow and behind the times.It's nice to see Apple still making a laptop with a DVD/CD drive. The price from Amazon was GREAT, so, I had to order it. The buying experience was good. However my experience with UPS was a 0 on a scale of 0-10. The driver did not knock on my door, left a post it note notice. I went to UPS that night. The driver had checked in and they could not find the box. I was told it would be at Pick Up the next day. I went back the next day, they could not locate it, and discovered that it was on the truck. I missed the driver by 3 minutes. He did leave it with a neighbor, and if I had not found the driver who was exiting the apartment complex, i would have had no idea where he left it. Bad UPS, BAD.Anywho, back to the MacBook Pro. While the screen is not Retina, it is still superb. Far superior to my MacBook. The build quality is typical Apple, solid, solid, solid. The SuperDrive is quiet. Sound quality is very acceptable.I haven't had it long enough to test battery life, but I will assume that up to 7 hours is realistic.The Intel i7 processor and 8 gig of RAM makes this a great desktop replacement.Based on my time with the Black MacBook I decided to take out Apple Care. It did come in hand once way back when and more than paid for itself the first and only time I used it. By the way, the Black MacBook is still running strong. All I needed to do for it was replace the battery in February 2013 as it had swelled.The MacBook Pro may look pricy at first, but due to the build quality, parts used and it having an aluminum body, I can see this one lasting 7 years or more. In that light, the 13.3" MacBook Pro is very reasonable in price and a winner in performance. And with Parallels 8 I am also using Windows 98SE, XP and 7 on my MacBook Pro. All run as if they were on a native Windows desktop machine. The 8 gig of RAM and the i7 processor make running virtual software a snap. With the latest MacBook Pro I actually have 4 computers in one. The latest version of OS X, and three versions of Windows. Combined with the SuperDive, great battery life, a crisp display and solid build quality, I am a very pleased user.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Juan Camilo Quintero De los Rios
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Excellent performance. The OS is great. I play Counter Strike Global Offensive on it and it was great. Only have to worry about using it. Definitively, I recommend this!

Reviews.Title: First Macbook
Reviews.Author: greendayrules
Reviews.Content: This is my first Apple computer and I am so pissed off I didn't do it sooner! From a windows computer to this is not a hard process. As long as you know how to use a computer you will be fine. I took me sometime to get used to the new system but definitely worth it! If you ever need to know anything just google it! It is lightning fast and the 500gb memory is more than enough.

Reviews.Title: From PC
Reviews.Author: Kwanza
Reviews.Content: This computer is like...I'm lost for words.This is the best switch I have ever done.I came from a Dell Inspiron, I also paid about $1000 for it.This has much more memory and ram memory.Even the battery life is like WOW!I love, LOVE, LOOOOVE!

Reviews.Title: I'm Sold..
Reviews.Author: William O. Slack "DaRev"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with a Presonus board and Toon Track Easy Drummer for our worship team. I've been a PC guy from the start - but experiencing the quality (a METAL case - not plastic - METAL!) and the ease of use, my next laptop will be a MAC - I hate to admit it!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jonathan L. Smith "Jonsmith2282"
Reviews.Content: Always love the way the Mac works. The best part was transferring files from one to another. Connected them to the network, and everything transfers, files, settings, programs. It was beautiful.

Reviews.Title: NICE MACHINE!
Reviews.Author: EeeVee "Another reader"
Reviews.Content: My grand daughter attends Kent State University. Seems the whole school... at an academic level... is going paperless. She had a PC. All of her professors and instructors use Macintosh.Knowing that I am a Mac fan-boy, it was a no-brainer that she asked me for this as a Christmas present.When the MacBook Pro arrived, I helped her transfer all of her schoolwork from the PC to the Mac... an easy drag-and-drop process utilizing a flash drive.It was delivered with 4GB of RAM -- 2GB on each of two sticks -- which was probably adequate. However, I always recommend at least 8 gigs, so I ordered 8 gigs from Amazon. When the RAM arrived, all 8 gigs were on one stick. So I simply pulled one 2GB stick from the machine and installed the 8GB stick in its place. The machine now has 10 gigs of RAM and it works just fine. But, hey, it's an Apple. I wouldn't expect anything less!

Reviews.Title: New laptop for my college student
Reviews.Author: MarkusMN "MarkusMN"
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Macbook Pro and this one is an exceptional value in my opinion.Macs are not the cheapest machines, but they simply work and last.  I have two of thismodel, one 15" model and the new 13" Retina display model.When considering a Mac, look at the total cost of ownership and not just the initial price tag.They seem to hold their value well and I just don't have any problems with them.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Michael Miller
Reviews.Content: Great product, Great price. Stop living in the stone age and buy a mac, you will not be sorry at all!!!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Colton Sessoms
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy I got this instead of another PC. Even though I could have gotten a pc twice the speed for the same price I still think there's nothing like a Mac. The operating system works so great that I think it makes up for a lot of the the slower hardware that the Mac has compared to Pc's. Overall I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Just right!
Reviews.Author: Margaret Olsen
Reviews.Content: First of all, I'm a forever Mac user. It's been time for a new laptop, and the only debate was which size of the Mac laptops, and whether to spring for the retina display. For my needs (I also have a desktop), the 13" is very adequate. The display is already extremely good, so didn't feel I needed to pay the $ for retina. I also looked seriously at the Macbook Air. I need the camera card slot (not available on the Air), and I'm not ready to give up the DVD drive yet. And again, the price difference is significant. My Macs have always been extremely reliable, virus free, and easy to use. This is no exception.

Reviews.Title: The first Mac I every purchased
Reviews.Author: KK
Reviews.Content: Before this MacBook Pro, I had been using PC for years....I'm still not sure which is better. So far I don't like the fact that icloud doesn't have function of uploading pix of iphone.

Reviews.Title: I converted back to Mac
Reviews.Author: Greg A. Hood
Reviews.Content: This is the best laptop ever, I do wish I would have tried the smaller version. this is quite smooth as well as heavy and can easily slip through the hands. Put a cover on it and is a little better but that is my only complaint. I love the Mac now it is quite improved from 10-20 yrs ago.

Reviews.Title: APPLE for Life!
Reviews.Author: ifamily99
Reviews.Content: I have owned a bunch of laptops and computers all my life;This is my very first apple- Life changed;This is by far the best ive ever owned;AWESOME! SLEEK, BEAUTIFUL, PIECE OF HEAVEN!EAST OR WEST APPLE IS DA BEST!fast, great screen, beautiful apps for a laptop;priced at 1100 on the apple website;amazon had it for 1098+ tax -  plus i had a 10% off coupon from amazon-cost me 998 plus tax- 1070- OTD!AMAZON and APPLE A++++++ both ROCK!

Reviews.Title: It's a computer
Reviews.Author: Alex Cruz
Reviews.Content: I work for an IT department for a hospital so I know about computers. Overall a nice computer. However, I am a firm believer that they are WAY overpriced for what you get. I have been using Windows since 95 and will always be a "PC", but I wanted to give Apple a try. I also use Linux so I am use to the UNIX system. The battery life is not as good as what I expected but this seems to be caused by Mountain Lion, even though there was an update to fix this. I would refer this computer to other users only if they are needing the extra power for programs and the upgrade capabilities (RAM, HDD).

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: E. Taheri
Reviews.Content: Typical apple product.  Well designed and fast.  This unit is being used for graphic design at  our office and works well.

Reviews.Title: Amazon saves the day
Reviews.Author: DPlans
Reviews.Content: The first one we got was defective and had to be returned.  My daughter was heading back to school and needed to take it with her.  Amazon rushed a new one using one day delivery at not cost to us and my daughter was able to take the computer to school.  Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Devon
Reviews.Content: My sister and I were very happy / satisfied with the Apple MacBook Pro she ordered. It arrived on time and is a great computer - thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Mills "coderchrismills"
Reviews.Content: This is such a huge improvement over my old MBP 15" (2007). Speedy, sturdy and the screen may not be retina, but it's still fantastic. The ram upgrade (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006EWUOL8/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_2) I purchased at the same time was well worth it. The battery life is pretty good too, typically lasts around 6-7 hours when I'm writing code.

Reviews.Title: best laptop computer made
Reviews.Author: Chipbuilder1
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for myself and I just love it.  I purchase replacement ram and maxed it out at 16Gig.  It is extremely fast and does everything you need in a computer.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't get any better
Reviews.Author: Srdjan
Reviews.Content: Got it as a present from my wife for my birthday few monts ago, and I couldn't be more satisfied.Once you get used to it if you haven't used mac before, you'll be enjoying best computer experience in your life!What is there not to like?Thin, light, pretty, quality built, awesome battery life, fast, reliable,multi touch gestures(saves so much time, so easy to organise).Not to mention software, beats Windows down to it's knees.You wont regret extra few $ spent on this, in fact we liked it so much that we decided to get another one right after.Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Perfecto product
Reviews.Author: Hazael Abraham Hurtado (haza)
Reviews.Content: Best computer in market, I really recomend this product to people working on music or graphic design works.... Good resolution, no anoying noises, BEST!!Take care.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Andrés Salazar Larco
Reviews.Content: if yo like practicality this is the laptop for you. Small size but extremely powerful, osx mountain lion is a great OS

Reviews.Title: good laptop
Reviews.Author: Shawn S
Reviews.Content: If you want this, get this!only con is the high price, but compared to other cheaper options...this is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Staying in touch
Reviews.Author: RickyB
Reviews.Content: The MacBook was needed as a replacement.  The product has more than met the requirements and will be well used. I would recommend this to friends and family members. Thank you

Reviews.Title: This is an absolutely awesome computer.
Reviews.Author: Florence Thompson "F. P. Thompson"
Reviews.Content: The only drawback that I have found to purchasing something this expensive on line is that no one offers you any advice, any insurance, or any technical support.  I have spent a small fortune buying teaching books. All you get is a box and a computer.  After the computer comes, you are completely on your own to figure out everything.  Because I still have a couple of Windows computers, it is easy to go running back to those.  Gradually, I am getting used to the new operating system.

Reviews.Title: From a PC user to Apple; LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: John Ruff
Reviews.Content: After trying win 8; I'm glad I bought this! Plus it connects with all my other devices; so I can display it on my big screen wirelessly via Apple TV, iPad, iPad mini, and iPod touch are all in sync and if I lose or break one, its all in the cloud! From someone who was all ab PC and saying I would never own apple- I'm glad I came to my senses... And with my business, it's invaluable!

Reviews.Title: You get what's expected
Reviews.Author: Magali  Vaz
Reviews.Content: I'm not reviewing the technical specifications / features of a MacBook Pro, there are thousands of websites & magazines that do that. This is my second MBP & when the apple webstore cancelled my older, Amazon came in & delivered. It came quicklly & was packed well. Been five months of intensive use & I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: AKVHutch
Reviews.Content: Haven't really had much opportunity to work with this, but thus far it is great.  Compared to the Windows 8 upgrade I just did getting this machine ready to go is a snap.  Only took about an hour of time to load & upgrade everything I wanted initially.  Try doing that with Windows.  I am a former Windows person, but I am quickly moving to a MAC

Reviews.Title: New mbp owner
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: After doing lots of research , no other product on the market exhibited as much quality workmanship and longevity as the mbp and OSX. There was simply no way I would accept windows 8 as my next OS.

Reviews.Title: Our first Mac.  Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ronald Bissett
Reviews.Content: Sweet machine, fast, light, excellent screen, boots quickly.  Love the capabilities with photo software.  Able to get PC files transfered over without much difficulty.

Reviews.Title: One of the best!
Reviews.Author: Ganapathy Iyer
Reviews.Content: Have bought several laptops in last several years and hands down this has been the best ever. Most of them were either too big, too noisy and too slow after 2 years. Mac User interface is just the best. Have used windows for years, so switching takes a little adjustments but once you get used to it, you won't feel like going back. Also, the laptop is quite, no more burnt laps, best screen display, and small additions like backlit keyboard wins your heart over. Considered MAcBook Air also before buying this Pro, but glad bought the Pro, because I didn't fancy carrying a bunch of adapters, separate DVD player etc.....Honestly didn't see too much difference visually between this screen and the retina display, so didn't fancy paying that much premium for retina, others may fancy that, I didn't.Compared other ultrabooks like Zenbook and the price were very comparable but none of them carry the reputation of Mac, so stuck with MacbookOnly thing I dislike is that everything for Mac is expensive but I guess you pay for quality!

Reviews.Title: Having problems getting used to it.
Reviews.Author: Value Shopper Pensacola
Reviews.Content: I like the way this computer is set up.  I am used to computers with windows so I am having a little difficulty finding my way around.  Once  I learn how to navigate I am sure I will love it.

Reviews.Title: Great mac - even better for less... it was  $962 ($236 Off) just a couple ahours ago.
Reviews.Author: dkoDesign
Reviews.Content: The Macbook Pro is the premier choice for designers on the go, as well as people who generally need more oomph than the Air provides. I would say that 85% of the design industry is Mac for good reason. When you work on a PC with design software, it goes kerplunk. Yes. Still. After all these years.Why not the air?Unless you are between 2 and 4 years old, weight just isn't as big of an issue as people and Apple make it out to be.In the real world, performance is the bigger bang for the buck, especially if you install an SSD or hybrid drive in it. Oh, by the way, yes. You can upgrade it. want to upgrade an Air? Too bad. Tough nuts. No way. Sorry Charlie.I would rate the 13" macbook pro as 4 star simply because of the integrated graphics card. Other than that, it's aces.More good news is the resale value is on pretty much all Macs is so high. You can spend $$$ on a mac, and 3 years later still get $$. Better yet, run it for 8 YEARS! (Like my last macbook) You can easily with no degradation in performance (unlike PCs which die a slow death as windows "evolves").All in all, I highly recommend this Mac.

Reviews.Title: Best Laptop PERIOD!
Reviews.Author: t_mariucci
Reviews.Content: I have used many different types of laptop over that past 10 years.  I have had a total of 5 different laptop from many different manufactures.  This is my first Apple laptop and it is pure awesome.  It does everything that I need it for for school.  The build quality of this product is above and beyond what I have been used to on Windows laptop.  The operating system OS X mountain lion is every easy to get used to.

Reviews.Title: A powerful, compact and durable laptop, ruined by awful cooling
Reviews.Author: Derek Elam
Reviews.Content: I liked almost everything about this laptop when I owned it except two things: the price tag, and the cooling system. It's not upgradable either, but chances are if you're buying a Mac you won't be doing that anyway.The i7 processor on Apple's lightweight OS X is impressively fast for a laptop, and 8GB of RAM is more than enough for most uses. Mine had a 640GB hard drive and an optical drive that worked well enough.It's expensive, yes, but Macbooks are impressive systems even for this price. They're made from aluminum instead of plastic and are solidly built, and very compact. The i7 processor coupled with Nvidia's mobile graphics card is powerful enough to game on, BUT...the real deal-breaker for me with this Mac was its cooling. In favor of a sleek "unibody" design, Apple neglected to install proper cooling for the CPU or the graphics, with the only exhaust vent being behind the hinge of the laptop, and no intake vents anywhere. Fifteen minutes of Minecraft would easily get the CPU chip hot enough to boil water, and sometimes it would just crash. The lack of vents on the bottom makes chill mats/cooling pads a fruitless effort. The aluminum body absorbs some of the heat, but this is actually a bad thing, because it can easily get too hot to keep on your lap, and touching the bottom with bare skin could even cause minor burns.So I sold mine off. But if you aren't planning to game or do anything else that demanding of your laptop, it's a great system. I'm just stumped as to why anyone would pay 2000 bucks if they weren't going to use it for something like this.

Reviews.Title: Apple does it right
Reviews.Author: Caleb Crouch
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is a great laptop. I needed a light-weight, quality laptop for work/graduate work/personal use. This laptop replaced an Apple Macbook Pro 15 inch, which I purchased in 2007 and help up through March of 2013 - which is fantastic in my opinion. I even resold the old one for about $100. I haven't found a MS based product that lasts as long and OSX is user-friendly and just works. Additionally, I saved about $50-75 plus no tax and free shipping. This model comes with 4GB memory, easily upgradable for minimal cost (I've read confirmed reviews of people successfully putting 16GB of memory in this laptop on newegg.com). You can also upgrade the HD for around $160, still significantly less than if you configured it that way from Apple. So far, works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: First Mac, from a former Windows guy.
Reviews.Author: TheCleansingTide
Reviews.Content: First off, I love this computer.  I bought it because i wanted a portable DAW and i had some tax money left over.  Coming from windows was not an easy transition however. Macs are confusing as balls. You download something and it dissapears forever....until you find it. You try to drag a file to your desktop screen and all you've accomplished was creating two of that file. Which is terrible if your moving 34Mb raw audio files. Once i figured out how everything works (about a week) i found that working on a Mac is just waaaaaaay faster and more productive than working on windows. From the DAW perspective, Mac doesn't support VST format...so thats kind of an issue. Your plugins have to be AU format and theres not many of them out there. Sucks. But...this computer comes with iLife or whatever its called. Basically Garageband, and some photo and video editing software (dont care). Garagebands not bad. Its like a super dumbed down version of Logic, which is Mac only anyway, so probably a good place to start. It comes with pretty much everything you'll need to start recording. Got a guitar, and that rocksmith game? well, macbook pro recognizes that cable and you can record directly into your usb port into garageband. pretty cool. No driver install necessary...like on a windows computer, where you would need ASIO4ALL or something. Performance wise, its not the fastest laptop in the world...but theres an i7 core model that probably runs like lightning, and people are putting extra memory in these computers anyway. $100 from crucial.com. Its only crashed on me one time in the 3 months i've had it. it was right in the middle of recording tho, so that sucked. So far, only 1 hiccup, no viruses still got plenty of memory even with buttloads of plugins and software installed. runs smooth. 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Great Machine!
Reviews.Author: Ty's Mommy
Reviews.Content: First, let me say that while yes, I do prefer macs over pc- I have primarily been a PC user so I have plenty of past history. I have owned over 6 windows based laptops and several desk tops over the years- everything from Dells, HP, Toshiba, Sonys, and others. I am a heavy computer user. I program, code, design, compile, create, prepare and abuse my machines (unintentionally of course). Regardless of what I do, the PC never seem to last- I have to upgrade, restore, add memory, etc. and now its almost cheaper to just buy new ones rather than fix up something that is 6 months old.I purchased my first macbook over a year and haven't look back. Its stable, clean, lightweight, and I haven't had a single issue that didn't take me just a few quick minutes to fix. I have now have a 13 and 15 inch and don't go anywhere with them.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for photography purposes. I needed a laptop with big storage, a nice screen and fast so I can photoshop without any problem. It suits me perfectly for what I need and I'm very satisfied with this purchase.I don't give it the 5 starts because of the weight factor. It's quite heavy so I try to never move it around. I guess that if you need it more as a stationary computer, it'll be alright. Bought this one instead of the air because of the storage. And besides you can watch movies with any DVD ;) which you can't do on an air laptop.I don't know about the other technical facts, but for an average user like myself, you won't be disappointed if you get this laptop as long as you don't have to carry it around too much.

Reviews.Title: Another Great Product from Apple
Reviews.Author: Dennis Meek
Reviews.Content: We got the Apple MacBook Pro 13.3 to replace an aging iMac. The iMac is still functioning for the kids and still works great after 8 years. The issue is we can no longer upgrade to the newest version of OSX thus we don't get the benefits of the new features. The new MBP offers great portability and gives us confidence that we are not going to need to purchase a new laptop in 18 months. Something we did often when we purchased Windows based laptops.Apple OSX is simple to use and has a more enjoyable and intuitive interface than the new Windows 8. I'm not saying it's for everyone but it's a great solution if you want a simple to use device that you know won't be at the end of it's life cycle in a couple of years.Pros-Great functionality-Integration with iCloud and many of the apps you use on an iPad and iPhone.-Log battery life even with wifi on and streaming movies via netflix-Very durable unibody case-Still has an optic drive-Mag Safe power cord is a nice touch-Intel i5 processor works very well-The chicklet keyboard is AWESOME!-The single best function is the backlit keyboard. There is nothing worse than trying to work on a plane and not being able to see the keys without an overhead light that blinds you.-The track pad is incredible. I'm a person that will not use a laptop without a mouse. I just don't like trackpad's because they never work right. That is until now. I can easily use the Apple Track Pad without any issues and now I don't even travel with a mouse. My bag just got a little lighter. I do however like the Apples Magic Mouse but I really don't need it.-It just works. We found that out when our new MBP found all the office and home printers, installed drivers and started working with no effort on our part.Cons-Heavy compared to Ultrabook laptopsRecommendations: I would definitely recommend 8 Gigabytes of RAM. Just because the processor is a 64bit architecture and can efficiently utilize the RAM. I wouldn't by the factory RAM just because it's expensive. Amazon has a nice selection of RAM from various suppliers that will work. We went with the Corsair Vengeance 8GB (2x4GB) DDR3 1600 MHz (PC3 12800) Laptop Memory (CMSX8GX3M2A1600C9).If you have never installed RAM in a Mac Laptop go out on YouTube and watch a couple of videos. It's very easy to do but it's nice to have someone walk you through it first to get a little confidence.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly awesum
Reviews.Author: Dr.Rocki
Reviews.Content: Have been using Windows laptops for my entire life. So, I thought why not give Mac Book pro a try. From the time I opened the box, I am truly amazed by the built quality and screen. I had a misconception that switching from Windows to Mac is tough, but it's really not that bad. I am loving my new Mac Book.Pros:-Amazing design and built quality.-Awesum screen-Extremely good back-lit keyboard.Cons:- A bit higher price tag (which is really worth).- Switching from Windows to Mac may take some time.

Reviews.Title: Just the best!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I'm Not exagerating when I say this computer is perfect..i It is!! It's small but powerful, light but strong, elegant and beautiful... In resume: it's a Mac! I recomend it without any doud!

Reviews.Title: Macbook Pro Review
Reviews.Author: Ben Miller
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this model of the macbook pro. I can say that I am fully satisfied with the performance that the computer has supplied. It contains a long battery life, incredible specs, and an overall enjoyable performance. Upgrading from a toshiba laptop, I am fully impressed with all of the benefits that the mac operating system provides. The snappy processor allows for me to quickly upload photos and videos, as well as create movies for me and my colleagues to enjoy. In upgrading to this computer I can say I have found little to any flaws in the product, hence the 5 star review.

Reviews.Title: Saved $200 from buying at the Apple store.
Reviews.Author: Peter Konicek "Peter Konicek"
Reviews.Content: Bough this product a while back and so far no problems. With no problems,  I'm happy with this purchase because I saved money compared to buying it anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Not disappointed in my first Apple product
Reviews.Author: EddieK
Reviews.Content: I've been looking to purchase a new laptop for the past year.  During that time I zeroed in on the 13.3" MacBook Pro and finally took the plunge of owning my first Apple product.  Initial impressions are what most people describe, excellent build quality, very good screen resolution(non-retina), quick boot up, and intuitive controls.  Instead of ridding my hard drive of unwanted garbage that has no use and uses up valuable resources(i.e windows) I'm off surfing the web in literally minutes after taking this product out of the box.  It's fluid, lag-free, whisper quiet, and just so easy to do whatever you choose to do with it.  I would recommend this product to anyone who's looking for a solid, performance oriented laptop.  It's great resale value only adds to it's long list of attributes.

Reviews.Title: Macbook Pro 13"
Reviews.Author: gregory
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for the money. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a full featured laptop. Compared it to the Macbook Air which is thinner and lighter but has no optical drive and a slower processor. Don't need  a retina display because my old ass needs glasses and I wouldn't notice the difference for all the extra cash.

Reviews.Title: Runs like a bat out of hell!
Reviews.Author: S. Romeo "romeosc"
Reviews.Content: The 15" MBP 2012 is the fastest Mac that I have ever used!I didn't want the Retina one due to most applications don't support yet. In fact I still use manyLegacy programs (Appleworks, FileMaker Pro, Quicken, Photoshop etc)! Because the MBP camewith Lion and included a free upgrade to Mountain Lion, I could not run any of those legacyprograms. I have Pages, Numbers and many other programs that will import the old files, but somecouldn't!The solution was to buy a copy of Snow Leopard Server from Apple for $19 and a copy of Parallels 8 OEMfrom Newegg for $28.I run Snow Leopard in a Virtual Machine on my Macbook Pro and can use ALL of my Legacy programs.I can run any of the current programs on Mountain Lion and run the Legacy programs under Virtualization.I now have the best of both worlds.The USB 3 is FAST!

Reviews.Title: Windows PC convert ... never a regret
Reviews.Author: J. Jordan
Reviews.Content: A discounted price for a new Apple laptop is hard to find from a reputable company....and then there is Amazon to save the day! As for the laptop, this is our 3rd Apple computer in the past 2 years. Prior to that we were die hard Dell / PC fans. After getting sick and tired off all the blue screens, the (what seemed like daily) updates, and the OS lock ups, we decided to give the Mac world a chance. While we have been faced with some limitations regarding software (getting better daily), the problems that are persistent with a Windows PC are all but gone. The huge accolad I can give to Apple is; they just plan work...period. With this laptop in particular, to review it, will take some time as it is pretty fresh out of the box (so far so good though). However, I dont expect it to be any different than the rest...awesome!

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop[NEWEST VERSION]
Reviews.Author: store avoider
Reviews.Content: Great picture. I like the lighted screen at night. Very fast for everything. No trouble viewing YouTube. Starts up fast. No trouble with anything on it. It was a great buy. I like it better than my old Mac-which I loved. I have never gotten a virus on it.

Reviews.Title: one of the best purchases of my life
Reviews.Author: Luis Pizarro Salom "chavela"
Reviews.Content: The product was sold used like new, and honestly it was exactly the same that buying it new, it was in perfect condition, no scratches, everything as described, with all the accessories, I'm completely satisfied with this product and with the seller.

Reviews.Title: Highy recommended, exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Halla Margrét Hinriksdóttir
Reviews.Content: Great service, highly recommended. It totally exceeded my expectations. Everything in the description is consistent to the product I got.

Reviews.Title: Important Note Please Read
Reviews.Author: thundercloud "C.B."
Reviews.Content: I am one of those people who had the problematic 2010 version of the MacBook Pro. The ones that overheated and died an early death. Also based on my past excellent experience with mac computers I did not purchase an extended warranty. My MacBook Pro died about a month ago and I almost did not get another one. Unfortunately I had become a mac addict because when a Mac works it works very well. My Windows based computers were always crashing, usually about every three months. The worst a Mac ever did to me was freeze up.My new Macbook Pro arrived yesterday. I normally DO NOT write a review until after I have used an item and on a computer I wait 3 months. I am breaking that rule today because there has been some IMPORTANT CHANGES that I feel people need to know about especially those folks like me who have had a bad experience with this line of macs.This Macbook Pro RUNS FAR COOLER than any mac I have ever owned EVEN WHEN THEY WERE NEW. This might be because of the new i5 processor. It might be because Apple re-engineered them and cured whatever it was that caused the problem. I don't know. All I know is that even my longest lasting macs always ran fairly warm and that 2010 model ran hot all the time. In my opinion this should make these new macs run far longer than the old ones especially if you get the solid state drive( I did not).This Macbook Pro has my other Macs beat on speed even when they were new.I will update this review and report any problems I come across. If you see no updates it's good news. One thing is for sure. With this Mac I am purchasing the extended warranty through Squaretrade. Apples warranty is too expensive and only runs 3 years. At one time they offered 5 years. The Squaretrade warranty goes up to 4 years and is about $50 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Nice Apple Machine For Great Price
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: I searched many websites and only Amazon had low price for this Apple Machine. I am loving the fast performance also. Amazon rocks.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: John McKenna
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece.  Not only was she suprised, she tells me every time I see her how happy she is with it.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop ever!
Reviews.Author: Yaron Goldstein
Reviews.Content: Best laptop ever created as of yet!Usability, design, speed, battery life, sharp display, amazing touch pad and what not ...

Reviews.Title: Speechless
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I'm photographer and like most of the beginners, I started with a very basic computer, actually old... Very old pc (windows 7). Don't misunderstand, I'm not saying I'm super professional and I'm still learning, but I get paid for the job I do (weddings, food photography, etc)So, when upgraded to this jewel I just got speechless because of the speed on each task with large files (.tiff) dimensions 6 x 3 ft. With software like photoshop and above after effects, etc.I'm very happy... I love this computer and definitely recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop, but a bit overpriced for the specs
Reviews.Author: Gerome
Reviews.Content: Overall a good laptop, not great. Strong build though which really adds to its durability. Girlfriend dropped the laptop while using it from around 4 feet, the glass cracked, but the screen was still in tact. I would have to say that's a big pro.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Bryan 418
Reviews.Content: This is my first Mac and I couldn't be more in love with it. I've made many digs against Mac people in the past but I now understand why they love Mac because its nice having something that works and doesn't freeze up like my PC would. I also am glad that I have this and not one of those horrid windows 8 computers because that OS is dreadful.

Reviews.Title: Best Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Naveen Prasanth S.K.V.
Reviews.Content: I am a college student and I needed a computer that is long lasting through my career so I picked the macbook pro. This is the best decision I have made in my life! I have been a PC user for a very long time and all my PC's got viruses so had to replace them every 2-3 years. And the best thing about MAC's is you don't get VIRUSES!!! This is definitely worth the purchase

Reviews.Title: Great size. No iBook reading. Steep learning curve.
Reviews.Author: Charles Redd
Reviews.Content: Since I have iPhone, iPad and iPod I thought that my next computer should be a MacBook Pro. Took a long time trying to decide between one with retina display and one without. Next had to decide between 13 or 15. Chose the 13 non retina display  and glad that I did. Biggest disappointment is that I cannot read the iBooks I purchase from Apple on this machine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product. Lives up to expectation of Apple products
Reviews.Author: william bland
Reviews.Content: Sold on all Apple products. Have two ipads,two macbooks,an imac 27",ipod nano and an iphone in thefamily and am completely sold on their quality, value, and ability to retain their value.

Reviews.Title: I walked into the Mac experience wanting to like it.
Reviews.Author: BSG
Reviews.Content: This is my first Mac and it's really just an expensive experiment. I still have to use my two other windows machines to get most of my work done because, as much of a pleasure as the Mac is to use, it's not worth re-purchasing of a ton of software. One thing I am still happy about is the price I paid at Amazon. I had been watching the prices for six months and a brick and mortar store (rhymes with Test Fry) put it on sale the week of Thanksgiving. Amazon's prices can change by the minute and for about two hours, the price dropped as low as it had ever been and matched the Test Fry price. Even though I can't use it for work much, I am still glad I made the purchase. The best features to me are the multiple desktops, the swipe gestures, and the seamless way they work together. Also, the way it works with Apple TV is nothing short of amazing. The more Apple products you have, the more it sense it makes to acquire more. And lets face it, reading these reviews isn't really going to sway you on the product, only on where you purchase it. And with my Amazon Prime membership (the best $79 I've spent in years) buying it here was a no-brainer. $3.99 got it here overnight. Any repairs are going to have to be made by Apple anyway and who wants to deal with a pretentious "Apple Genius". I prefer "Google Genius". Oh, and a Book Book is worth the price. They sell that here too.

Reviews.Title: Best MacBook
Reviews.Author: Gerardo C. Guzman Lozano
Reviews.Content: I wont write too much, Apple just builts the best computers, you cant go wrong with this computer. Buy the separate RAM memory and you will have a rocket!

Reviews.Title: Best......Thing.....EVER!!!!!
Reviews.Author: devante franklin
Reviews.Content: Ok i've been a PC for years....mostly because I couldnt afford a mac. so when I had the money to buy one I bought other things instead....a 700 laptop and some extra stuff with it. but now that im starting a business I needed something that was reliable because my laptop started to slow down horribly.....so that when I remembered...ive never heard of a mac slowing down or crashing after a few months ( replaced my pc hard drive after about a year). so I saw this one didnt know much about them but bought the newest version on the first buy....I did a good job lol this mac is awesome. HD graphics, clean and stylish look, built very well, and it even runs on the same internet in the same house almost 3x as fast as my pc and even picks up more signal from the access points than my pc....yea wont say all is great though the whole holding ctrl+left click was a little annoying. had to ask a guy in starbucks how to do it then i learned the double finger click but all in all this mac is awesome. webistires even look better on this thing. im only using this for business basically so Im hoping for some good years with no big problems...total 5 stars on this. full recommendation....probably should have checked apples sight before i bought here but oh well i love it anyway. new box and everything.

Reviews.Title: Love it.......nice and fast
Reviews.Author: J-Man
Reviews.Content: I love are 15 inch MacBook Pro! its so easy to use compared to a windows computer! And its SO fast with that i7 processor!PROS: Its very fast, a great computer for photo editing, a bunch of cool little bells and whistles (like the hot corners and the dashboard....ect!!!)CONS: Price is a bit ridiculous, kinda heavy (but not to bad by any means.)CONCLUSION: For anyone who does photo editing this is the computer your looking for, VERY fast and fun!!!

Reviews.Title: Works great !
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I had never considered buying a Mac because of the high price. However, after having several other Apple devices over the years and enjoying the lack of errors and problems with the devices and the OS's, I gave it more consideration as I approached buying my very first laptop (after having over 20 years experience on desktop PC's).  I saved about $300 buying it on Amazon rather than elsewhere (no sales tax, big discount and $3.99 overnight shipping with Prime). The machine is brand new and it came installed with the Mountain Lion OS.The screen is excellent, it boots up fast. USB 3.0 is very fast. The trackpad works far better than I had anticipated. The gestures are amazing. The OS is very different than Windows, but is not hard to navigate. I store my regular 'Work in Process' documents on Dropbox, so those were a cinch to pull over. I still have to migrate my pictures and music to the machine. All of my bookmarks in Safari that I created over the years on the iPad pulled over seamlessly. The integration with my other Apple products via iCloud is outstanding.Everything from the box, the instructions, initial setup, downloading and installing software, the navigation of the OS....it all has a consistent and polished look.  Before i bought this I felt like I was getting the 'low end' laptop from Apple. After using it for a few days I am in awe of the performance and design. The screen is the perfect size and everything pops on it. It is very thin and quiet! I haven't heard a fan yet. This is money well spent. Thanks!Update 1: I upgraded my RAM to 8 gigs and this laptop is blazing fast!!! I can't believe it had the impact that it does. If this machine continued to run just like it does now, I won't need to upgrade for years to come. I used the Crucial brand and recommended specs so I don't screw with the warranty.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro
Reviews.Author: Bill D. Gaiche
Reviews.Content: My new laptop is great. It has so much more speed and the screen is very sharp. Downloads are real fast compared to my netbook, no comparison. I have to admit that the operating system is different and does take time to learn but I like it. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: PC to Mac
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I purchase the Macbook Pro 13.3-Inch Laptop about a week ago and the experience has been great. I was a little worry at first because I don't have a lot of experience with os.x and windows has always been second nature to me after many years of using windows. For anybody that feels like switching from windows to apple let me tell you that it took me a couple of days to get used to this operating system but now I love it. First of all, the trackpad on the Macbook Pro is easy to use and after you learn all the gestures to use the trackpad you will see that this is a great way to use you computer. The computer itself is very well built and the keyboard is great to type on for a long period of time. Lastly, bootcamp is one of the main reasons I switch to Macbook Pro because you can run window 7 or any windows operating system you want on your Macbook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Great Adaptability, Sleek, Reliable
Reviews.Author: Hot Sheet
Reviews.Content: Best laptop ever. Versatile light, a little expensive but 100 times more reliable than a Windows PC. Has never given me any problems I have owned 3, unlike windows which has given me hardware and software issues. Is easily upgradable I have 16gb Ram and 240gb SSD( by the way it screams fast). Is capable of running windows( parallel, or fusion) for those not familiar with OSX. Stunning resolution, with a viewing angle that does no have to be adjusted every time you change direction. Sleek and stylish, fast, and reliable. Definitely worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Ballin
Reviews.Author: daniel gallegos
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with it! The only problems that I've had is the battery dies quickly, and the optical drive doesn't seem to work, I just think this is the fact that it was used, I love this Mac!

Reviews.Title: Fraud seller
Reviews.Author: michael r.
Reviews.Content: The Mac was a 2009 model not a 2012 as stated in his add. Also had a lot more damage to it than described. Will never by from this fraud again.

Reviews.Title: Worth The Money, Love it!
Reviews.Author: Othermom
Reviews.Content: I'm a 52 year old who just purchased this new in box. I wanted the dvd superdrive built in, dedicated memory and "older features" as they are now called in 2014. I adore this laptop, am a former Windows user and have always hated it. THIS is wonderful, it NEVER catches a virus, has a beautiful display and is super fast. A 15" display was too big for me as I'm a smaller person and wanted to be able to take this with me without using a larger bag. It's perfect! I purchased a full body hard plastic case with rubber key cover in red and get all kinds of compliments. Macbook Air and the others just won't cut it for me as now you have to buy the super drives separately, ext. This was beautiful and ready to go 5 minutes out of the box! <3

Reviews.Title: Working just right
Reviews.Author: Reader_SLC "SLC_reader"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded my old MacBook to this one.  I've been using it for a few months and have no problems with it.  Wish it had come with iPhoto.  Glad it did NOT have Mavericks installed since my work computer upgraded that has been a real pain.

Reviews.Title: Excellence on so many levels!
Reviews.Author: Martha Peoples
Reviews.Content: My usual routine with a computer involves a LOT of browsing, streaming and writing online, so I don’t really need a powerful laptop. My old Acer accomplished everything I asked of it until it got too old. When I got this MacBook though, boy was I surprised!The difference in browsing speed was simply staggering! I thought that depended on my internet plan. Oh, and the apps! They are just wow and more wow!

Reviews.Title: Very glad I switched to a Mac from a PC!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Fink
Reviews.Content: I have been getting increasingly frustrated with my PC laptop always being slow. I've had it for 5 years, and this one replaced the one I had for over 5 years prior. I had gotten tired of always getting anti-viruses, slow speeds when I had multiple tabs open, and always trying to defragment or clean it up because it performed poorly. I've been itching for a MacBook for years, and when I got the amazon card with no interest for a year, I grabbed it. So far, I've had it for almost a month, and I love it. I really haven't used it to it's full potential yet, but I enjoy how not only is it VERY light, but I can use it for an entire day without charging it, unlike my laptop as it got older. (Near the end I couldn't have it unplugged for longer than an hour, so imagine if I wanted to move from room to room.) I hope to have an update in a few months to see how far I've come, but I have no complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: nagy awad
Reviews.Content: Meet my expectations and i enjoy using this laptop. I like it so much and i advise you to use it

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Clark III
Reviews.Content: I love my Mac Book Pro. Only problem is getting used to it since I had a Lenovo before the mac

Reviews.Title: Best laptop I have owned
Reviews.Author: Mr. Retro
Reviews.Content: Build quality is awesome, value is higher than any other laptop.  I run Windows 7 on this better than any other laptop I have owned.  A bit on the heavy side, but a small price to pay for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly, in great condition!
Reviews.Author: Ed M
Reviews.Content: No complaints here. Arrived in great condition and perfect working order. It was advertised as "Used" but it looks and feels brand new. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Stephen W. Riley
Reviews.Content: There is nothing to beat Apple, but it would be even better if it would accept programs from other developers more easily!

Reviews.Title: Never go back
Reviews.Author: James "James"
Reviews.Content: I used to buy a new laptop every three years and spend about $600-800 each time. My friend convinced me to get the iMac and I am very happy with my purchase. I paid about twice what I usually pay for a laptop but I can tell thus will last me over seven years. It takes a bit getting used to coming from a pc, but it is well worth it. Ask anyone who has a iMac, they will never go back to pc again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: Go computer no problems at all and i never have a macbook pro before and now i am in loved with this computer i am a dj and this computer is great for deejaying great i make a great decision

Reviews.Title: Excellent shape outside--inside required servicing
Reviews.Author: BobW "Robert Webster"
Reviews.Content: The MacBook is just what I wanted, fast, ample memory, OSX Maverick, like-new condition,and delivered on time.The only problem encountered was that it had not been wiped clean of all programs from the formerowner.  This caused big problems with my passwords and attempts to install my programs.  Had totake it to an Apple store locally for service before I could really call it "mine".

Reviews.Title: MBPro 13, A-1278, MD102LL/A, 750GB HDD, i7, 8GB RAM
Reviews.Author: Thomas Bangash "THBangash"
Reviews.Content: It may say to be the OLD Version, as the so-called Newer Version is available, thou that is not the true statement, as the Newer is not with the same configuration, not even close.The primary reason for me wanting this rather Former Model instead of the NEW Model (Retina) was the Configuration itself, and the UPGRADABILITY of it, which is almost NON Exsistant in the Retina Models.After decades of Pure PC usage, it does take a bit time to get use to the new OS and the way things work in this one compare to Windows, but that sort of applies to every change over.The integration of the system on my domestic set-up, consisting of almost purely Apple Products, from router to Systems, and Peripheral iOS units like the IPads, IPhones and IPods, went smoothly,

Reviews.Title: Great deal 4 me, but sloooow delivery
Reviews.Author: Doctor Plenty
Reviews.Content: The non-Amazon dealer (Hustle Double*, I believe) was absolutely great.  I would absolutely recommend him (I think) as a 2nd party seller.  Very trustworthy.  Except my package was not sent off on date promised.  But in the long view, for what I got, that was relatively minor once the computer did arrive (about five days later than I expected)  I'm typing this on my almost MacBook Pro right now!!*don't be put off by the name, it's a baseball reference

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: DJ IIJIMA
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my granddaughter she just loves it. we went through many different brands of laptops and was notsatisfied with it, but the Apple Mac is wonderful. I am thinking of getting another soon. definitely will recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Another Gift
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my niece and she uses it all the time.  Could not be more happy just loves her MAC

Reviews.Title: Still one of the more versatile laptops avaialble
Reviews.Author: R. Vigil
Reviews.Content: A lot of these reviews are similar for pros/cons and details about these older model Macbook Pros that most people agree with. However, I use mine in specific manner that is more versatile than the newer Retina MBP models.What I did with my quad i7 2.3Ghz, aside from maxing the RAM to 16GB, was to remove the optical drive, and add an SSD. So, now I have two drives accessible in one machine. However if you do this, you'll want to put the old spinning hard drive in the spot that the optical drive was in, and put the SSD in the original hdd spot. There are cradles/brackets available to do this easily.Now that SSDs are somewhat affordable, this is an idealistic laptop system where the SSD is the boot drive, running system apps and OSX, and the old 500GB spinning drive is all files, movies, music, games, etc. Where shortcut links are used in Docs, Music, and Movies.In my case, I used a Samsung 840 series 250GB SSD, and I get read/write speeds at 490MB/s and 225MB/s. Couldn't be happier with this set up. Try it!

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro
Reviews.Author: Dudly
Reviews.Content: My daughters HP's screen became intermittent after only 13 months.  We replaced it with the MacBook pro which she loves.  It has been about 2 years now with no problems at all.  She is about to graduate from college and  has become a total Apple fan.  I now have her old HP with the inop screen connected to my HDTV with an hdmi cord, and we use it to stream stuff to the big screen.  It is still going strong without its own screen.

Reviews.Title: Excellent computer!
Reviews.Author: Joel Heath
Reviews.Content: I love my Macbook Pro!This computer is amazing! It is so quiet, easy to use and powerful. The computer is well-built and made from high quality components. If you want a lot of computing power in a sturdy, sleek package this is the computer for you.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: I bought my Macbook over a year ago and it runs like its brand new, I don't think I'll ever get another computer other than Mac.

Reviews.Title: Best lap top around
Reviews.Author: DONALD ROBINSON
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for a grad and he LOVES it!  He assures me that Apple is the only way to go in college,

Reviews.Title: perfection
Reviews.Author: eloy martinez
Reviews.Content: It took two attempts to buy a computer like the one I had and it was well worth the time and patience

Reviews.Title: best computer
Reviews.Author: Francisco Perez
Reviews.Content: Mac are one of the best computer there is out there.this computer is fast, nice resolution,this computer is awesome.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: liam hogue
Reviews.Content: the comments concerned me but i decided to order from amazon warehouse. the mbp i recieved was everything it should have been. great shape, only 6 cycles on battery, great product.hopefully the "bright people" posting other versions of this mbp in this listing can figure out how to make a listing for the specs they are selling and can stop trying to cheat people. read all information in the listing before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Computer
Reviews.Author: Adam C Pulford
Reviews.Content: When buying an apple, you always get a high quality product; however, when buying through a 3rd party, make sure you inquire about when that party purchased the computer first; the warranty begins after THEY purchase the product, not you.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Jean Prout
Reviews.Content: Enjoying the compact feel and the new OS. I've had it for about 2 months now and found no issues with software or updates. I'm overall pleased with the interface and the portability of this product. I also recommend using this because it has the hard ethernet port instead. Some of the newer models of Macbook Pro do not have an ethernet port. That is one of the main reasons I bought this product instead of the newer ones. The screen on it does not feel too small, but I like using an external monitor while I'm at home.

Reviews.Title: As reliable and functional as the older models
Reviews.Author: David D.
Reviews.Content: I needed to buy this unit to replace my six year old Apple MacBook Pro.  It has all the same feature with updates on the plug-ins and other newer technology.  Can't go wrong with Apple products because they are built well and Apple has great customer support.  I left off the last star because of price.  I hate paying a lot for a product like this, but it is worth it I guess.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Carla O'Brien
Reviews.Content: Great price.. brand new.  LOVE IT…. don't know if I'll ever go back to a PC.  Very easy to use and was comfortable after just a day with it.Not well versed in computers either, so If I can handle a Macbook Pro…you can too.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Sergio Quiroga
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect lap top for us.  This one still has the CD slot.  The picture and apps work great.  Glad I switched from a pc.

Reviews.Title: Great Hardware to work with Audio Production
Reviews.Author: Mariano Andres Ponz
Reviews.Content: This is my first macbook and I am very happy of it as it made me available to work professionally with audio software as it has solid and fast components.  I updated the RAM to 16gb which is the maximum you can have in this macbook.  Is practical to carry it anywhere, the trackpad's shortcuts are awesome as they make a faster experience of it.I recommend this article to everyone who is interested in having a complete laptop to work and also to for ordinary use.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Susan Gregg
Reviews.Content: Got it fast! its as advertised on here..... it works great and is not a waste of money! I cant say anything bad about buying this item from this seller

Reviews.Title: It's a Mac!
Reviews.Author: aindelicato
Reviews.Content: I love my Macbook, just hate the price.. comparatively, you can buy 3 decent Windows laptops for the same price as a Macbook.  Runs good and does the job, can't complain about that!

Reviews.Title: get one it is worth the money
Reviews.Author: RUSTY
Reviews.Content: it a mac what more needs to be said, this is so much better than i ever could have imagined

Reviews.Title: Easy set up and features are great.
Reviews.Author: wickless "scent girl"
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves this and I have to say I was impressed with it.  He is a big gamer and loves all the features.

Reviews.Title: wooohoo!
Reviews.Author: Leander Gilua
Reviews.Content: amazing! i love my new laptop! works great and perfect! cant stop using it! must buy! and it came early than expected! such a great service!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased :)
Reviews.Author: Diep Ta
Reviews.Content: This Macbook works like a charm and looks almost good as new, minus some cosmetic scratches that are barely visible. My used macbook also came with a charger that has an extension cord to it! I am more than happy with my purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: best price for the best laptop
Reviews.Author: William LINDER
Reviews.Content: best laptop,fast great shipment shippment was in a protected case within the box i was worried as this was the first laptop i ordered online however it was in great condition and was the best price out on the market

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected...
Reviews.Author: Layne Murphy (filmclip@aol.com)
Reviews.Content: Well designed and very intuitive.  Screen is easy on the eyes and the keyboard is comfortable to use.  I haven't loaded a lot of programs yet but it does fine with the few that I use frequently.

Reviews.Title: Mac Book Pro
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: This is the Best Computer I Have Ever Owned! I have had it over a year now with out a Glitch of any kind..I love the lit up keys and screen display...this thing is Fast and clear as can be..I have over 4000 songs and hours and hours of videos and movies on it and still have over 700 Gigs of space left..NO Viruses can sneak in...its Just Amazing..Once you go Mac you will Never go back!

Reviews.Title: Awesome laptop
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: First Mac laptop. I was always against them but now I buying one I'll never go back to PC. Awesome.

Reviews.Title: a great product
Reviews.Author: Crispin Crispian "Crispin"
Reviews.Content: I'm new to the apple world, so I've had a few growing pains and I still need to set aside some time to go through all of the tutorials, but overall, I've been very pleased.  THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS TERRIFIC!!!

Reviews.Title: I'm really enjoying this computer
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: I saved $150.00 by purchasing this through Amazon as opposed to Apple. It was delivered quickly and in perfect condition. Being used to PC's there is a bit of a learning curve, but it's not so bad. This lap top is so quick and not difficult to learn.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rin
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop for designers! I have the full adobe cs6 suite on it and it works very fast.

Reviews.Title: very happy with the mac
Reviews.Author: ryan derrough
Reviews.Content: It came in the condition i expected and is definitely working well with the programs i use for school. definitely satisfied

Reviews.Title: Great computer for video and photo editing!
Reviews.Author: J. Savio "Very Savvy"
Reviews.Content: I've been a long term apple fan boy! I've dressed up as apple products for halloween and even waiting 24 hours for a new iPhone. I love Apple's computers. The build quality, software, support and price (if you buy and sell each year, makes it affordable).Apple's hold value, much better than PCs. If you buy a mac you will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro Review
Reviews.Author: EAS
Reviews.Content: I've chosen this rating because it deserves it as it is. I've had my computer for 2 weeks already and it works perfectly. There's nothing I dislike about it. For my opinion, you can trust this purchase if you made it.

Reviews.Title: Pleased so far
Reviews.Author: Gabe
Reviews.Content: I first purchased a Sony Viao fit 14 touchscreen with 850 GB because my old Dell crapped out. Did not enjoy the new Windows 8 and touchscreen functions. Decided to spend a couple more bucks and purchase my self this Macbook Pro. What a beauty of machinery, super fast,quiet and does its job.Cant really say much just had this laptop for less than a week but so far im very pleased!Will deff take care of this machine,deff worth the money!Just research yourself tips on how to give it proper care  and you should be fine!

Reviews.Title: I Love It !!!!
Reviews.Author: cora2020
Reviews.Content: It's been a long time that I wanted to own a MacBook Pro.  When my Dell laptop gave up only after 2 1/2 years, I decided to buy MacBook Pro.  I've heard so many positive feedbacks from my friends who already own a MacBook Pro, so i feel very comfortable that this investment will last a lot longer than a regular PC.

Reviews.Title: MOVE TO APPLE LIKE I DID!
Reviews.Author: Gerald A. Pelrine "some guy"
Reviews.Content: i'VE BEEN WANTING TO SWITCH FROM PCs TO MACS FOR YEARS. i FINALLY DID IT AND THIS MACHINE IS THE WAY TO GO! There is definitely a learning curve but its not too bad; just give yourself a couple of days and you'll never look back. Don't let the smaller screen throw you off, you'll see it just fine.

Reviews.Title: My MacBook
Reviews.Author: Elias Vaden
Reviews.Content: I love my MacBook. So much. Amazon was just the most helpful too. I would recommend anyone wanting to buy a MacBook to do so from Amazon. They have the best prices, they are fast, and completely reliable. 10/10 five stars would recommend.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: brayd
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and learn. Quick and has built in virus control. Links with IPHONE.  Size is perfect. Would definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: Top Competitor
Reviews.Author: Daniel H.
Reviews.Content: I have had the MacBook Pro for about 3 years and I have never had any problems with its performance. I like the design and its features but there are somethings I think needs to be improved. I believe that the Newer Pros should have Microsoft office installed as most buyers of this product are students. The HDMI Port could be introduced instead of having customers buy a connection piece which is hard to find, I picked up mine when I was in Japan while in the military at an Apple Store. There is no way you can find the necessary port in a Wal-Mart or Bestbuy and I have Checked.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Lonnie C Turner
Reviews.Content: I know that Apple makes bigger and faster laptops, some with more memory, but for the price this is a great little laptop.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Humberto
Reviews.Content: For us, this laptop is the best option because is light, the battery have 5 hours. The price is 200 dollars down.

Reviews.Title: GOOD ，I LIKE It VERY MUCH！IT HAD GIVEN Me A LOT OF FUN,I'LL RECOMEND IT TO MY FRIENDS!NICE NICE GREAT
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: GOOD ，I LIKE It VERY MUCH！IT HAD GIVEN Me A LOT OF FUN,I'LL RECOMEND IT TO MY FRIENDS!NICE NICE GREAT

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: mauro fragachan
Reviews.Content: I got my new mac and I have to say that it is amazing. everything worked out really well with amazon, so I recommend you to buy it through them

Reviews.Title: great computer... all around.
Reviews.Author: John Benda
Reviews.Content: Works great as second work computer. And portable all purpose machine - even movies and book downloads. Great computer for all around use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: Krystal D. Watson "Kwatson"
Reviews.Content: The item received was exactly as identified.  Also, there was a negative experience that was quickly transformed into a positive experience. The item was to originally be received by a specific date; however, due to the items being damaged in transit, Amazon promptly contacted me and notified of its status and immediately re-shipped a new item at no additional cost, which was received on time.  I was really impressed with the communication and services received with this purchase.Also, the specs of this laptop are perfect for the purpose intended, which is to cater to my educational requirements; furthermore, due to its high capabilities it can also be recommended for a small home business.I definitely will recommend this purchase and amazon to anyone!! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product, but with few initial hiccups
Reviews.Author: Hamid Azmi
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is the first time for me to use a Mac and I'm really happy with the move. It's durable and fast with excellent graphics. That said, in the short time that I've been using it, it has crashed twice and that's something that bothers me, because I thought was something I should not expect with a Mac.

Reviews.Title: Love the looks and the performance
Reviews.Author: hc
Reviews.Content: Good in every aspect. With the softwares supporting the use of other OS makes it much better.May its heavier and costlier but cant complain
