Reviews.Title: Gift for grandson
Reviews.Author: celnegdo
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my grand son. I was amazed at how fast the delivery was. He said he loves it and has been very helpful in his art class.

Reviews.Title: If you can afford it, this is the choice
Reviews.Author: Zora
Reviews.Content: I deal with both Macs and PCs and for a Laptop to be so problem free is just refreshing. All of my Laptops that are PCs have been sent to the shop this year and are brand new (no older than 1 year). For some reason Macs just aren't prone to catching viruses and the operating system is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this computer
Reviews.Author: Magdalena del Olmo
Reviews.Content: It is perfect. My son needs it for his school and it also serves our personal needs. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: My dream machine
Reviews.Author: J. Oakley
Reviews.Content: Having had the SSD on my 2010 Macbook Air fail twice in a year I was very concerned about the reliability - and fixability - of the Macbook Airs so I traded up to a regular hard drive (750GB) Macbook Pro. I was concerned that the downgrade to the regular hard drive would make it unacceptably slow but I need not have worried - this machine is the fastest I have ever owned... and with 8GB of RAM I can run a Windows 7 guest machine in seamless mode all the time... and it gives me the fastest Windows machine I've ever owned too!I am in heaven.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Moresi "Jman"
Reviews.Content: PRO:I love the product itself and I had great service from Amazon.CON:I don't know if the "spacebar" being curved as a mount and the "7" key's point of the keyboard's backlight subtly dimmer than the rest of the keyboard is the way Apple wants it or just some other unstable matter occurred during the whole shipping process. I understand I should call Apple Tech Support about any variables(which is my purpose of writing this con) as variables could be a bigger future problem.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Revman67
Reviews.Content: I've been  using mac for over 10 years and will always use mac! The new os is great on my macbook pro!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Device
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoying this Mac, having Boot-camp really just is the cherry on top of this awesome piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: Apple at it's best.....
Reviews.Author: Chris Landers
Reviews.Content: Hands down in the creative, educational and just web-based world Apple wins big. This unit has been tried and true in performance, and unless you are in a market segment where Retina is important don't waste your money. This unit and or it's big brother the 15'inch will do well. That said Apple has it's issues just like any pc manufacture, the unit that shipped had a faulty display thus I could not rate at any higher than 4-stars. Design wise Apple could do better in many aspects!

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: damowng "damowng"
Reviews.Content: It is a very very very good laptop! I love it very much! I will give five stars! Good! Good!

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Hannah Sinnwell
Reviews.Content: This computer came within the dates specified, and everything matched expectations perfectly. :) Great product, great price, great delivery, and great service. Love it. :)

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: Oscar Baeza R-
Reviews.Content: great, construction and software are excellent. Have it docked via the thunderbold display, use it for home music studio and work as well. great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great little computer
Reviews.Author: AmazonAddict "Cody"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my sister to take with her to college. It's much more lightweight than my MBP w/ Retina 15" and is much easier on the battery life. It's a great computer.

Reviews.Title: Long time Windows User, College Student and Programmer now a Mac convert!
Reviews.Author: Zee
Reviews.Content: I've been an avid Windows user since Windows 95 and have gone to great lengths to trash talk apple products  in the past. I had the same reasons as most PC users: the price, the overbearing restrictions of OSX and lack of support for games.That being said, I use this computer mainly for school. It's not extremely thin and light but definitely on the lighter end compared to most laptops. The backlit keyboard is an excellent feature when writing in the dark at night and the battery life is excellent.The OSX operating system is far more intuitive than I thought. I'm truly impressed and  thoroughly impressed with this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Nothing beats a Macbook!
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: I've had so many laptops and desktops and nothing beats a Macbook! I've had my Macbook Pro for two years already and it works just as good as when I bought it. I've always had issues with PCs slowing down and getting viruses, but not with my Macbook. It definitely is expensive but it is well worth it! The Macbook Pro is durable and sturdy. The software is wonderful and easy to use. I have nothing to complain about my Macbook. The only thing that went wrong was my hard drive went faulty after a year but it was so easy and cheap to replace it with a new one. I haven't had any problems since. I hope to get many more years out of it.

Reviews.Title: This is great
Reviews.Author: Jonathan A BentonSr
Reviews.Content: Daughter really loves this lap top. Will use when she goes off to school this fall, to North Western University.

Reviews.Title: Not what I remembered
Reviews.Author: Annie J. Chang
Reviews.Content: The last time I had a MacBook was the 13" white one that came out in 2007. I LOVED that. After it got stolen a few years later I went back to being a PC user with an HP. I guess I came back to Mac with expectations or something but there's something that's not fulfilling me with this laptop which I don't remember having with the old Macbooks.. sometimes images don't load when I'm using Safari and Chrome. There seems to be a lot of times when the mouse disappears or things just take forever to load or type in programs and the internet.. otherwise I do love it!

Reviews.Title: Way too good
Reviews.Author: waterballs87
Reviews.Content: This product is worth every penny. No computer I have ever had has amounted to this. I am completely in love.

Reviews.Title: finally
Reviews.Author: MARIA A SAAVEDRA
Reviews.Content: i love my i phone , now i have my dream come true with my mac , more than i was expecting

Reviews.Title: As expected, It's great
Reviews.Author: Raama Srivatsan
Reviews.Content: Where to begin?Build Quality:As is expected, It's made with the highest quality in materials. Soft touch, anodized aluminum with laser cut precision and no flaws. I love the little rubber seam that runs all the way around the edge of the screen that protects the screen from being scratched by the palm pads of the inner side. The keys are durable, and only start to wear out (become shiny) after about 1,000,000 hours of continuous use. I have another 2008 Black MacBook That has seen the most lengthy writing sessions with much sweating upon, and the keys still feel as good as new. I don't like the fact that the Screen is a fingerprint and dust magnet, but I fix that by wiping the screen down as a thing I do every Saturday Morning. The paint indicators on the side of the MacBook indicating which port is which has slowly become rubbed out from abrasion, but I know what port is now, so its ok. I wish I still had the paint in case I needed to sell it. The fan exhaust is located right under the screen hinge, and since it is easily covered, the laptop easily heats up. The trackpad is as smooth as velvet. I wish it was a entire button, so the trackpad wouldnt have to bend down when you press it at the top, but I've gotten used to the old way of thinking and using my thumb as a button-presser.Software:I can't say muchI love Macintosh. Grew up with it from OS 8I love how seamless and flawless it is. I can't wait for Mavericks, and I know it'll be a bestseller.I really love the fact that Mac has an app store with its constantly growing database, and great games.I wish iLife came hooked up to your account as soon as you enter your apple id with icloud so you can update it as part of your app collection, but since it doesnt cost that much, its coolHardware:Apple always has bleeding edge performance and I love their support of everything out thereMy Mac rarely ever lags, and even when it does, (unless the fan is blocked), the fan is almost unnoticeable. I've heard that they fixed the problem with the new Retina Display MacBook Pro though with the adjusted frequency fans. I really want to try that out for my self.I also love the super fast Ivy Bridge 2.6 Ghz processor with Great battery life.They only fact that I wish they had done was refresh the ENTIRE Mac lineup along with the MacBook Air's when they changed the processors to Haswell.Overall:I love this product.I love appleJust wish they continued the color variety.I dont know how much effort it would take to make an anodized black macbook pro, macbook air, and a iMac, but if they did, I know that if they did, people would trip over each other just to get their hands on one of themI know I would.So until that happens, I'm sticking with this.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Judy T
Reviews.Content: I bought the MacBook Pro MD103LL/A on 7-30-13 and received it from Amazon (through DataVision) on 8-2-13.I've had this computer now for one week and love it.I also bought the AppleCare Protection Plan for this computer from Amazon on 7-30-13.I received that on 8-8-13, registered for this plan, and look forward to using it if the need should arise.

Reviews.Title: Great and fast
Reviews.Author: Nicky Rus
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended, insanely fast and great computer, doing heavy multi-taking and office work etc all at once and it just runs and processes flawlessly, the battery life is extremely great as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A
Reviews.Author: worldunix
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Kid for CollegeShe love itreplaced her older one that i now use :-)Get one you wont go wrong

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Hannan
Reviews.Content: Great computer, very happy with this purchase.Mac runs just the way you'd expect it to.No problems at all.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Mac Book Pro 13" Great Brand and Great price!
Reviews.Author: SuperClear
Reviews.Content: The Mac Book Pro 13" is a perfect Laptop if you want use it for your home.  If you are willing to make a lot of Foto and video editing, you should buy more RAM memory, up to 8 or 16 GB.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: ethan robert domaingue
Reviews.Content: i don't really have anything new to say about the Macbook Pro that you probably haven't already heard from someone else or from another review.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: s. francis725
Reviews.Content: I mean Mac is the best computer out there period! SO of course this one came through with the awesomeness!

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro
Reviews.Author: Clocklady50
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my nephew going off to College this fall. He loves it and the capability it has enabled him to achieve.I would recommend this to any high school or College student.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: this is my first mac, and I love it. It is the best laptop ever!!! I'm so happy!! itis so light, so faster and you never heard weird noices coming from it!!

Reviews.Title: Apple as you know it ... simply perfect
Reviews.Author: Sammy
Reviews.Content: I bought the MacBook Pro for my wife. She simply loves it. It meets all her expectations regarding weight, quality...and of course performance.Although it is quite expensive I still think it is worth it. Here, I can also recommend to consider buying a refurbished one from Amazon Warehouse - looks like new!

Reviews.Title: There is not to much to add
Reviews.Author: Diegus83
Reviews.Content: This is my third macbook, and I've never been disappointed. It just works out of the box and you have a lot of cool software included with the OS.Integration between the OS and the machine is excellent, the gestures supported by the trackpad are really useful, the trackpad itself is beautiful to use, and I can't think of a better machine to do my work everyday and also enjoy my free time and do personal projects.The only issue that comes to my mind is this: the two USB ports are too close to each other, I've some old pen drives that are bulky and I can't plug two of them at the same time.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro
Reviews.Author: Daniel Backhaus
Reviews.Content: Love this laptop! Awesome form factor, great battery life, wonderful UX. After ten years on WinTel it's great to be back on a Mac. Great product!

Reviews.Title: good product, well shipped and handled, on time
Reviews.Author: Juan M. Pinto Ribeiro
Reviews.Content: great cost - benefit; quality above expectations;  a bit expensive when compared to other non apple products but still a good purchase

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product
Reviews.Author: William Johnson
Reviews.Content: So far it has met my expectations for the sole purpose of the reason I purchased it. I really like this laptop.

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet
Reviews.Author: Stanley C. Kozloski "craigk4"
Reviews.Content: I've been an Apple user for a long time. This is the third in a series of MacBooks starting with a Black MacBook. I decided to go with the faster i7 version and I don't regret it. Everything is faster. I ran Snow Leopard up until buying this MacBook Pro. The only downside was having to give up some older apps that don't run in Mountain Lion. But, I found newer versions or replacements made for the OS that are generally better.Externally, it is the same as my previous Aluminum MBP. Which is great because of the classic design. The design is simple and elegant. If you are a PC user, you might miss the lack of myriads of flashing lights and extra buttons. Besides being elegant, the MacBooks are durable. The previous iterations are all in the hands of family members and still going strong. If you don't have family members to hand down to, the market for used MacBooks is strong and can be sold to help cover the cost of future upgrades.If you are tethered to Windows, there are several options for installing Windows on your new MacBook Pro. So, you can have the best of both worlds in one computer. Yes, the MBP is more expensive than competing PC laptops. But, your MBP will be useful long after today's PC laptop has been forced into the "recycle bin."

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Nicky Linke
Reviews.Content: I have had this for several months now. I waited to review to make sure it is what it is. I was debating about going with the similar one with retina display, I was torn between that and the CD-ROM drive. I opted for this one, (with the drive) I have NO regrets, in fact, I 'm very glad with my choice. I use the drive a lot, and to have one without would be a pain for me. (An external drive would be a nuisance.) I have always had a P.C and was a little reluctant about going to MAC, especially never using one.  I'll never go back to P.C! Love my MAC!!!Thank You Apple for a great product!

Reviews.Title: macbook pro
Reviews.Author: blaise
Reviews.Content: I did not buy my computer off of amazon, i bought it directly from apple which i recommend you do if your worried about anything this computer is excellent, it is very fast compared to my previous PC. totally worth the money in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Moved from PC to the MAC BOOK WORLD
Reviews.Author: alexa
Reviews.Content: After using a pc for long I now became part of the Apple world.This is fast, graphics amazing and easy to use interface. Easy to customize setting and even create your own bookmarks.I love it!

Reviews.Title: MacPro Newbie
Reviews.Author: Jamey Olsen "Keishidojo"
Reviews.Content: Where to start, well the 13" MacBook Pro is just the right size for what I wanted, the keyboard is backlight (which is a big issue for me), the trackpad is awesome, and the overall functions are very nice.  I like the brightness and adjustments.  The little features are very well done.For a new Mac user, I can say there are some things that definitely take some getting used to.  I am still learning what all this little power PC can do, but I will say I like it.Core I78GB Ram750GB HDD13"OSX 10.8I have been able to make some really nice movies on this PC.  To see a sample of what I have been able to create with this Apple MacBook Pro check out on Youtube.com - Keishidojo (Bjj/MMA commercial, Jiu-Jitsu Fight Team, Reece, and the Youth Grappling Team) videos.  Also the OSX is well laid out to make things simple to share online and make these type of things easier.I would certainly buy this laptop again.

Reviews.Title: Mac...
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: What else can you say, its a mac. Replaced this one with my mac that was stolen, its a great computer.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Angelica Mezza
Reviews.Content: super fast, light and great. It came before the day it supposed to which is great. I don't have too much time with it, but right now Im happy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Esteban Sepulveda Sanhueza
Reviews.Content: after years of bad windows based computers now i dont have errors, blue screens and overwarmed laptop, the battery is great, it works for hours and every instrument i plug in works amazing.

Reviews.Title: Awesome computer
Reviews.Author: Russell Haston
Reviews.Content: I have always been a windows pc user but finally got tired of the stability issues and the layout of Windows 8. I purchased my first Mac and am glad I did. Rock solid platform that never crashes or hangs up. Wish I would have done this years ago.

Reviews.Title: macbook pro
Reviews.Author: Vali Dees
Reviews.Content: Great computer, works much better than my previous PC laptop!  Faster, better antenna, apple has different approaches for some uses but easy to adapt

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop (NEWEST VERSION)
Reviews.Author: Rodney Daniels Jr
Reviews.Content: It is very useful and my first MacBook Pro, everything is working fine. Thank YouGod Bless and God Loves You

Reviews.Title: Sorry for having missed out all these years on Apple products
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Sabatini
Reviews.Content: Having been a PC man since the beginning I am sorry I missed out all those years on Apple products!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: S. KAPOOR
Reviews.Content: My iBook G4 died & I had to get a new laptop. Since I have always used Apple products, the choice of Macbook Pro was obvious. I am very pleased with the best laptop around, namely Macbook Pro. For my use this was better than Macbook Air. This is my 6th Apple computer. The sequence is: 512 K Macintosh, Mac II, Power PC, iBook G4, iPad mini, Macbook Pro. I like the feel of this computer & hope this will last me through the rest of my days (@ 78+, age becomes an issue).

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Gina Polini
Reviews.Content: Got this MacBook for a great priced. It arrived super fast and well protected. Very happy. Excellent buy! Why would anyone buy it for more anywhere else?

Reviews.Title: Excellent laptop
Reviews.Author: luis laina
Reviews.Content: Thank you Steve jobs for this experience. All apple products are fantactic. its very faster and funtional.i am very happy with my apple purchases.

Reviews.Title: Gifted brain box
Reviews.Author: Joshua Tree 1973 "Harve"
Reviews.Content: This laptop was given as a gift. The receiver was full of superlatives for the quality and performance. It offers features and performance not offered by other laptops.

Reviews.Title: very good notebook
Reviews.Author: Hannibal
Reviews.Content: Excellent notebook for quality/price. I bought it for my daughter's birthday who has enjoyed it so much. She was able to edit a bunch of video clips and create a home video with music UN 5 hrs by using iMovie . That was the first time she uses a Mac!!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop.
Reviews.Author: rsfinsrq
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my Daughter in college. She absolutely loves this laptop. Great for students for their studies and as a media center in the dorm.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Having recently lost my old laptop I figured it was time to upgrade (go big or go home as my friends say), and that's just what I did.Excellent laptop, runs smooth, looks great and overall I couldn't be happier with my new Mac.The only think to note is that the top does get dirty (not the screen the actual casing of the laptop), other than that it's great!

Reviews.Title: New mac user
Reviews.Author: JOe
Reviews.Content: First time mac user and after one week windows feels like going back 15 years in time. I don't know why I didn't make the switch sooner...o ya because it's expensive. But so far it definitely feels worth the price.

Reviews.Title: best of all computers I've used
Reviews.Author: D. FRANEY
Reviews.Content: I've had more than 12 laptops and PC's at home and at work since 1994.  This is by far thee best, most reliable computer I could find.  I've have custom built PC's.  several dells and even a few IBM's.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Beloit
Reviews.Content: Have been using Apple products for years and have never been disappointed. I would recommend to any one lloking for a first class computer!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: This is the best laptop I have ever owned, and it was much cheaper to buy it on Amazon than through the Apple company itself. Perfect for all my graphic design classes I'm taking this year in college :-)

Reviews.Title: Superr
Reviews.Author: Ravi Maharaj
Reviews.Content: Love this computer. Super light, super sexy & everything just works. Considering upgrading the HDD to an SSD as well as the stock 4gb RAM to 8GB. The best trackpad i've used - great gestures as well as very smooth & responsive to touch.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Paul Willis
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to come around. But I finally realized I needed to make the switch. it is the difference between chaos (life with a pc) organization (life with a mac). Things are so much simpler now.

Reviews.Title: Best Laptop I've Ever Owned
Reviews.Author: PackerinMN
Reviews.Content: After owning a Gateway, Dell and finally an Asus laptop, I decided to switch to Mac.  It couldn't have been a better decision. In the first year, I have had zero problems.

Reviews.Title: Love my laptop
Reviews.Author: bernadette
Reviews.Content: Love this laptop, its a prefect size for travel and to take to meetings, the smaller screen does make using some adobe products odd with all the tool bars and work area - however I stillam happy that I got the smaller one rather than lugging around a larger model.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Mike Dickey
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly and was just what we wanted!  Great gift for Mother's Day!  Lightweight, fast, and has all the software and memory needed for a teacher!

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro is a 5 Star
Reviews.Author: Mark Taflinger
Reviews.Content: Simply the ultimate laptop. You won't be disappointed. The size and the features were exactly what I was looking for in a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop it has been great, this is my first Mac and I am extremely pleased with it

Reviews.Title: The product is very nice. It is as announced. It is robust, with a friendly use as all Apple products. BUT it is too heavy, much
Reviews.Author: Márcio Antônio Estrela
Reviews.Content: The product is very nice. It is as announced.It is robust, with a friendly use as all Apple products.BUT it is too heavy, much more than the most recently notebooks and ultrabooks.

Reviews.Title: Great computer!
Reviews.Author: Kevin M. Hynal
Reviews.Content: Great computer.Very great Apple product as expected.Good battery life.Great color on screen.Good speakers from laptop computer.Be aware of price differences when purchasing computer.  Price was higher when purchased on MAC when compared to price showing on PC when I bought this product.  Amazon has since fixed the price to show the same, but it is now higher on both platforms (but price is the same now).

Reviews.Title: This is a wonderful piece of equipment
Reviews.Author: Anne
Reviews.Content: It actually worked better than expected the graphics are wonderful it's not heavy and it really helps with technical drawing

Reviews.Title: Simply great!
Reviews.Author: Noel Urena Chacon "Noel Ureña"
Reviews.Content: Excellent laptop! I love this piece of equipment, It will be hard to go back to other type of laptop after using a MacBook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Best computer ive had by far.... super fast super easy and super awesome. Considering another computer should be out of the question

Reviews.Title: Super good fantastic
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: I have nothing ti say it is very very good fast shipping a recommended to keep ordering here laptop works fine light last long with battery life

Reviews.Title: Nobody beats Apple
Reviews.Author: Stephen Papastephanou
Reviews.Content: What can I write; Who can beat Apple in reliability, ease of use, quality, speed, and beauty. My life has been enriched since I have been using Apple products. Shipping and service from Amazon, as usual is impecable. Item was received in about 2 days.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lego
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product. It was new just like the owner said! Thanks! Poor student extremely grateful!! I just couldn't find the manufacture warranty or the year of the product but I love it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Annelise
Reviews.Content: I just got it yesterday and it is my new favorite thing! It was an amazing price and they shipped it to me SO quick! Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Lidia
Reviews.Content: Really like it, I'm very satisfied. It came very quickly and in good conditions. I am lovin' my new mac.

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: i am so so so happy with my new laptop. it's exactly what i wanted, and it has all the new features and whatnot.

Reviews.Title: You will be pleased with this laptop
Reviews.Author: Ana Dorta
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend it. I spent months looking for a good laptop for me and I finally found it! I asked for some advices before buying a laptop and almost everyone told me to buy a mac if I could and I did it. Now I am very pleased. Shipping was really fast

Reviews.Title: Great Machine
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: All i got to say is i freaking love this mac its everything i wanted and more!!!! great price free shipping what else can i ask for!! runs great and works magic

Reviews.Title: Excellent! with very small problem.
Reviews.Author: jscharpe
Reviews.Content: The MBP was in PERFECT condition. There were no scratches or dents or any marks at all. Came very well packaged... one problem is that for some reason i cannot upgrade my iPhoto as it says i have to use the apple id i purchased it with... i am, and it still doesnt work.!? Even they guys at the GeniusBar said this is an awesome buy for being "Used"!

Reviews.Title: The best laptop
Reviews.Author: Glensimar Garcia
Reviews.Content: I think is the best buy I could do. A great team with wonderful benefits. I'm really happy with it

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: a happy customer
Reviews.Content: It lives up to the great Apple reputation.  I have experienced no problems, works as anticipated.  The computer is amazing.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro - top laptop
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Everything you'd expect from a Mac.  It looks and feels solid, with a flawless finish.  The screen definition is superb and it fires up super quick and same to close down.  Only had it a few weeks but doesn't leave my side. Glad I eventually splashed out and quick delivery from Amazon to my place of work.

Reviews.Title: I am having a blast
Reviews.Author: Lindon Mitchel
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone who is interested in portability with power.  I am new to Mac but my workflow has been enhanced greatly.

Reviews.Title: Apple MacPro Laptop.
Reviews.Author: Kim Levan "Retired"
Reviews.Content: This computer is what I expected and more.  I like the operating system.  It is fast compared to my older Dell desktop.  And I was able to transfer my files from my Dell to the Apple with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Just fabulous!
Reviews.Author: A. Bontke
Reviews.Content: I don't know why I didn't change over to mac sooner! It's so quick and responsive that it makes working/surfing on a computer so much more pleasurable!

Reviews.Title: lo mejor de lo mejor...
Reviews.Author: Richard Medina
Reviews.Content: configurable a español, potente, fluida con varias aplicaciones al mismo tiempo, los materiales de construcción son simplemente hermosos, el sistema operativo  es muy bueno  fácil de utilizar.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Edwina Shelley "PoohfectMom"
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful machine and loads of newer features that I know how to use.I haven't put any of my programs on it yet. I've just been using the internetand checking out the machine itself.

Reviews.Title: great deal for a used macbook pro at a a good price
Reviews.Author: Zaj
Reviews.Content: great deal for a used macbook pro at a a good price. in excellent shape and runs great. cam pretty quickly too

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Betty A. Johnson "Mighty Megazord"
Reviews.Content: What can I say? I love everything about this computer. I highly recommend it.It is well worth the listed price but I was able to find it on ecrater.com brand new not refurbished for $899.99 with free shipping. It pays to look around for the best deal.

Reviews.Title: MacBoyFly
Reviews.Author: Jhuntjr
Reviews.Content: Love the MacBook Pro. Starts up in a hurry and everything is ready to go. As a student I don't know why I didn't get it on my college campus at a discounted price. Once you go Mac you'll never go back.

Reviews.Title: Served the purpose
Reviews.Author: Joseph J. Doane
Reviews.Content: one of our better buys, we'd do it again if the opportunity presented itself; we're very satisfied with the product

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Artworks
Reviews.Content: Although, the Mountain Lion software takes some getting used to, this is a great laptop.  It is very fast and has everything that I need except for a word program.  However,  that was easily taken care of by downloading a great program from Apple that does everything I need.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Gearold P. Vanroekel
Reviews.Content: I love apple computers.  This new Apple Macbook Pro is perfect to use as we travel and still do word processing and going on the web.

Reviews.Title: best computer till date
Reviews.Author: tokunbo
Reviews.Content: the Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop (NEWEST VERSION) is so beautiful and cool i could not ask for a better computer. the retina display display make pictures i took years ago jaw dropping. i love the looks , speed and the back light that turns on when in a dark environment for easy access to typing. apple definitely makes great product. i will recommend this product to anyone interested in a product that offers solid performance

Reviews.Title: My friend really likes this
Reviews.Author: KalalauKid
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a friend to replace her eMac. So far she has been enjoying using the laptop. She wanted it for the portability. She is really impressed with the sharpness of the display and the speed of the processor. Since she doesn't really need it for anything other than email and web surfing, she hasn't gotten into the finer things this laptop has to offer.

Reviews.Title: liked very much
Reviews.Author: Arunprakash Sambandam
Reviews.Content: I very much satisfied with this product. It is very slim, the track pad is very much impressed with me.

Reviews.Title: In love!
Reviews.Author: KVA
Reviews.Content: Words cannot express how much I love my new Mac. I have had many, many issues with PC's in the past and I'm finally glad to have joined the Mac revolution! I would recommend this computer to everybody.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: raymond
Reviews.Content: i love it ... is till learning how to use it but works great and having no problem with it

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro 13.3 Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Kim Schaefer
Reviews.Content: Purchased for our son as a Christmas gift.Perfect size.  Set up was a breeze.This will be my next computer!!

Reviews.Title: #1 laptop
Reviews.Author: forsey123
Reviews.Content: this laptop far exceeds other laptops on the market...took some time to adjust to the apple software as i was using  microsoft...have 2 other apple products...the communication between the equipment is amazing...highly recommend apple...

Reviews.Title: No more PC's!!!
Reviews.Author: tneely2327
Reviews.Content: We have completed our transition to apple products with the MacBook and could not be happier. We have an iMac and iPhones and everything from printing to picture sharing works seamlessly every time. The MacBook is fast, easy to use and the screen resolution is beautiful...highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: alaina wells
Reviews.Content: im satisfied with my macbook, i didnt trsut giving them 1k at first but, it was worth it. love it!

Reviews.Title: Love the aluminum
Reviews.Author: Cuong
Reviews.Content: This is my first Apple computer. The reason why I choose apple MacBook because of their design and the aluminum casing. I decided to go with this model instead of the retina display was because of the upgradable memories and hard drive for cheap.The MacBook right out of the box was ok. I wasn't really feeling the speed especially coming from a long time SSD user on my window. Then again my feeling was changed after a week when my new Samsung 830 SSD and 8GB of rams came in the mail. I quickly took the back cover off and installed the hard drive and ram. Reformatted it and my face just smile at start up.Now this is the MacBook I wanted it. A little expensive after the upgrades but it was worth it if you can get it for a good deals. I pretty much use this for web browsing, a little photoshop, a little video editing, and little gaming so the graphic card is good enough. Got my desktop for all the other hardcore stuff :)

Reviews.Title: Very very good
Reviews.Author: jose antonio
Reviews.Content: This is one of my favorite purchases, very eagerly awaited, all very well and very happy with the whole product.

Reviews.Title: Great Apple Product at A Great Price
Reviews.Author: Andrew M Falco
Reviews.Content: Great Apple Product at A Great Price.  Amazon is usually the best place for price when it comes to buying Macs.

Reviews.Title: Everything I hoped
Reviews.Author: jaybee92345
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad to have this computer.  It completely supports my home business and personal life.  All the needed extras of cords, etc came with it, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Just got it
Reviews.Author: Nicki Wilson
Reviews.Content: First Day:Runs smooth, no scratches and no damaged box. Good job Amazon. I was worried that the UPS would damage it more than anything. This is the basic model 13 inch non-retina. The 2.5ghz CPU is flying with install of a game as we speak. All the ports are much needed since this is my main computer. I had a hard time between this and the Macbook Air but the ethernet port and DVD drive made me buy this for my main. I was around 80% battery and did the first game install Diablo 3, and my battery went to 30%. Just remember to plug it in or it will drain your battery when doing dvd installs.2 week review:I use parallels, I wish I had more than 4GB of ram for gaming/running virtual machines. Ram gets eaten up real quickly so either buy it with more ram or make room for extra cash and buy 8 or 16.Extra Thoughts:I also bought parallels 8 and windows 8. I will update my review when I install them.UPDATE:I have used it for some time now. This is not my first time using Mac. I enjoy the experience simply because it is not Windows, I hate the blue screen. I do use Windows 8 in Parallels 8, if I get the blue screen or it slows down I simply reset it via Parallels 8. Love it. Best of both worlds, Parallels 8 even comes with Android and Ubuntu if you are bored. :)Here is Parallels 8.Parallels Desktop 8 for MacHere is Windows 8.Windows 8 System Builder OEM DVD  64-Bit

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Shonna Gavin
Reviews.Content: Was so hesitant about spending this much on a product for myself, as I am a single mom and pinch every penny, but this purchase was so worth it.  So glad I did not waste money on a less than par product.  Love my macbook pro!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: PS1 "PS1"
Reviews.Content: It  works great. I am very happy with my first Mac. It arrived very quickly and it has been fun to learn how to use.

Reviews.Title: Not bad so far....
Reviews.Author: J. Syverson "Viking Cruiser"
Reviews.Content: This is my first MacBook coming from a Windows environment. Like so many others who do this there is a learning curve and I'm excited to do it. This MBP is clean, neat, and simple. I like that. It takes less time to power up, and if you just close the case it go into sleep mode. WHen you open it wakes up almost immediately. Very nice. I am pleased with my decision, however I have only had this for a few weeks. There are a few things I am dissappointed with though. Only 2 USB ports. Most Windows laptops have 2 to 4 or more. No HDMI port. Most Windows laptops have at least 1. The headphones jack is a combo jack for the headphones and microphone. Not a big deal for me, but if you Skype a lot or are gaming a regular headphone set with a separate jack for the headphone sound and microphone input will not work on a Mac. These are about twice the price of an equivilant Windows machine so it was a tough decision, but like I said I am pleased so far.....

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Laptop
Reviews.Author: S. Lewis "JB"

Laptop was actually Built December 16 2012... Item cam straight from Manufactures warehouse to amazon which it stayed few hours then reshipped to my amazon locker box... ..This is not my first Mac computer, and certainly will not be my last. paired with EnjoyGadgets Thunderbolt to HDMI video adapter with audio support, iPearl mCover Hard Shell Case for 15" Model A1286 Aluminum Unibody MacBook Pro (Black keys, 15.4-inch diagonal regular display) - CLEAR, AOC I2353PH 23 - Inch Widescreen Ultra Slim IPS LED Monitor with Dual HDMI - Brushed Metal, Apple Keyboard with Numeric Keypad MB110LL/B [NEWEST VERSION], Logitech Wireless Mouse M215 (Red), Premium 1.5ft (0.5M) Ultra-High Speed HDMI Cable - 120 Hz - Version 1.3 Category 2 - 1080p - PS3 - Blu-Ray - XBox360 - RED Color, HP KQ246AA 8.0 MP Deluxe Webcam, USB 3.0 to Esata Adapter Support Port Multiplier (Patent Pending) - U3esata, Mediasonic HF2-SU3S2 ProBox 4 Bay Hard Drive Enclosure with USB 3.0 & eSATA, Epson WorkForce 545 Wireless All-in-One Color Inkjet Printer, Copier, Scanner, Fax, iOS/Tablet/Smartphone/AirPrint Compatible (C11CB88201) perfect office tool with portability.....

Reviews.Title: Amazing computer
Reviews.Author: Christopher ETOU
Reviews.Content: I will recommend anyone having the mean to move to mac. After replacing the spinning hard disk with an ssd drive, my mac is just flying. My virtual windows7 is powering in seconds and it does not feel like a virtual machine when using it in full screen.The only thing I am not satisfied with is the battery life management, the GPU in dynamic switching mode makes some applications consume excessive battery life.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Eugene Lockhart
Reviews.Content: This item was a tool for school/Christmas gift for my son and he was so thrilled when he got it he almost cried

Reviews.Title: A converted PC user into a Mac user.
Reviews.Author: Wildfire8
Reviews.Content: The Mac book pro is a computer for the disorganized, lazy, and eye candy person in all of us. With my PC, understanding how to jump through hoops is important. The MacBook pro already understands how to jump through hoops and acts more like a friendly guide. If you want to use the Internet, then you can make your icons jump out from the bottom of the screen, like a magnifying glass is projecting onto the selected icon. This computer is amazing for the individual who does not want to do any extra work via their understanding of their laptop.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Asked For
Reviews.Author: Elvia Silva
Reviews.Content: I knew what I wanted when I chose this computer: lifetime, battery, the works. Of course, the obvious thing is that no product is ever perfect; I knew I'd have to sacrifice good old adobe in order to prevent having to buy spyware and what not, but in a way, its worth being more safe than sorry.Nothing wrong with this computer at all! Packaging was excellent, the tech support is friendly. Just be careful; you always have to give up some good stuff for others.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Taulant Toska
Reviews.Content: The computer is perfect. It came in brand new and works perfectly. I used to use PC but after getting this Mac I am never changing back.

Reviews.Title: MacBook

Reviews.Title: Apple quality declining but still light years better than a PC!
Reviews.Author: sarmomemt "sarmomemt"
Reviews.Content: I have been a loyal Mac user since 2001 & have never looked back. I bought this Mac book pro along with a new 27" iMac & while they are still light years more reliable than a PC I have noticed a decline in the reliability of my Mac computers. The problem for me has been all with memory (ram) even with the ram maxed out on both computers I every once in a while have it lock up while editing photos (professional photographer) at first I thought aperture 3 was the problem, I switched over to Lightroom and there was a noticeable improvement but the problem remains. I have brought both in for service a number of times.- there was an issue with the seal on the monitor which caused dust to get under the screen- there was a problem with the screen refusing to wake from sleep modeEvery time apple handles the problem & fixes it for free. Apple products generally work out the small issues on their own, you only get problems when it's something big. Fortunately apples customer service is great.While I had my MacBook in for service I used my husbands HP laptop (similar specs) and there were many more quirks so overall I'm still happy with my purchase - apple still beats out windows/bios systems hands down but I would be lying if I said I wasn't concerned about the seemingly obvious decrease in quality over the years. I buy a new Mac every 2-3 years for work. With the needs of a professional photographer I generally need to keep up with the best specs. I've never had a pc live longer than that. I choose to upgrade, I don't have to. My first PowerBook stillWorks!

The Office Suite for it is cheaper than the one for any PC and it is so light I carry mine around in a tote sized purse for ease of use. This is the best Christmas gift ever! I highly reccomend this for any female who thinks that MAC is a pretty computer and attends college, Especially online. I am not taking any of my classes online but I would get this product for my college student! It is such a motivator to help the student want to be and stay on the computer. Our short (Females in their early to mid 20's) ADD attention spans are hard to keep on one thing but their is so much in this computer it is almost impossible to get bored. Five stars Easy!

Reviews.Content: I was looking between different combinations of Dell and Apple. I found it toughest to decide between Dell ultra books and Apple. There is nothing wrong in Dell but I preferred Apple 13.4" Display 500 GB Hard Drive, 4 GB memory and Intel Core i5 Processor (3rd gen).. This is best laptop.Advantages:1. Although there  is a small learning curve for Mac OS to get some hands on - but as I am familiar with Linux I am very comfortable with Mac OS... this is the only thing I see difficult with Mac Book .... and this is advantage in other sense coz you will be amazingly in a new world of OS and features...... and even if you are too restricted to MS Windows, you still can have partitions and Windows installed virtually or through boot camp... with all native speed...2. Macs never crash... I never see any application taking too much to respond and going nasty ....and same applications I saw going goofy on my other laptop which carries Windows with similar hardware.3. There are no issues at all with internet security and virus attacks... I don't even have any anti-virus ...4. If you are restricted to Word processing applications like MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, you can have MS Office on Mac just in $119... but if you are not restricted but still want this capability, Open-office can solve all your problems...5. You can make Mac virtually same as Windows if you are Microsoft fan.... I am also Microsoft fan and doing the same....6. Incredible display, laptop size and weight.... great battery backup...7. accept trusted content only e.g. tools, software etc.8. No other brand has touch pad like Mac .... you don't even need lot of keys from keyboard or mouse when you have MacBook touch pad with youDisadvantages:1. Cost is more as compared to other brands. Other brands can come with higher configurations in same cost.... but Mac is Mac2. learning curve for OS and other features3. less free stuff compared to other communities... accept programs from trusted developers only

I just bought a Pro with the high end i7 chip, 8 GB RAM and a 512GB SSD with speeds that almost defy belief.  Everything is practically instant.  The same goes for my iMac which I recently upgraded with a 521GB SSD. Frankly, while I was shopping I have not seen ANY 15" Pros with less than an SSD.  Obviously, they're out there but not here.  BTW, Amazon's quoted retail price is the Pro with the 512GB SSD - check the Apple Store.  Apple is charging a pretty penny for them.  One can get a 512GB Crucial from Amazon for about $400 which is good.  It cost me an extra $200 to have it installed in an iMac since I wasn't about to fool around with it.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro as replacement for MacBook Air
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey White
Reviews.Content: Even though since 1984 I have directly purchased over 60 macintosh computers for private and business purposes and indirectly hundreds more to clients by recommendation. From 1988 to 2010 I was a graphic arts professional, electronically based on Macintosh computers, and a consultant to other such professionals in helping them deal with computers in their business. But when Apple walked away from supporting older software, some of which CANNOT be updated, by discontinuing Rosetta when they introduced their Lion operating system, I decided I would no longer purchase, support or recommend a Mac.Unfortunately my wife's 2009 MacBook Air developed a hardware problem that didn't seem worth repairing. I couldn't talk her out of another Mac, and very I'm sorry for that. This mac has been a problem since we got it. Even though it uses an I7 Intel processor, it is no faster and may be slower than the system it replaced. Startup times are incredibly long: over two minutes. This has to be because of software bloat from what I would argue is the worst MacOS since the original 128k mac introduced in 1984 (which I owned).Perhaps if you've never owned a computer, none of this would bother you, but if you come from an older mac or from the Windows side, the clunkiness and sloth will drive you nuts. In addition, of course, since pre-intel software is no longer supported, about 1/3 of my wife's programs were trashed. Some we could replace (the Office suite for $150 we didn't need because the version we had served her needs, but won't run on the new mac), while others have never and will never be updated. Fortunately we do have other older macs (Snow Leopard or earlier capable) so we can kludge.Recently however, this Macbook loses the ability to print to our network laser printer, a HP Color Laser Jet. The computer says it can't find the printer, even though it printed to it 10 minutes before, and other computers on the ethernet, both mac and windows, can also print to it. Given the way print spooling works the only reliable way to reestablish printing capability has been to trash the print que and create a new one. Sometimes this is possible through Bonjour (the Apple print protocol) or more likely it must be done via direct ip addressing, which in our local LAN with an address of 192.168.x.x, the computer thinks our printer is in Boise, Idaho! How stupid is that?By the way, when the print que is deleted to fix the printer, everything in that que is lost. Not a problem unless we were printing many pages from different web addresses which were sent to printer while we went on without keeping track. Rebuilding such a que is a pain.If you already have a Lion-based Mac, then getting this computer will not surprise you and you will probably find it very nice because you don't know any better. If you have an older mac, or a windows system, I strongly suggest you go to windows or stay there. You will be sadly disappointed with this.

Reviews.Title: Apple Macbook Pro 13in June release
Reviews.Author: Samuel Adams
Reviews.Content: Well let me start at the beginning.  I am a male in my mid 20's. For all of my life I have owned toshiba laptops. For the most part they have treated me well. But when it really came down to it they just were not very reliable. Sound board stopped working and the internal fans never seemed to keep the laptops cool enough.  I say all that to say this. Switching computer brands is one thing, but switching your OS is a much bigger step. This is the step i finally took. After buying a new Macbook Pro 13in I can say it has been the best purchase in electronics i have ever made. I am a man who loves to research and in all my searching I could not find a computer that is an equal to the macbook pro.I am 100% pleased with this purchase. It was far more then i though it would be.If you have any worries about buying it from Amazon just make sure that the one you are buying is sold by Amazon and not a 3rd party seller.  Amazon always has a cheaper price then most sellers and is a safe way to purchase your new apple product.Enjoy!

Not a good sign for the Apple "control everything" approch to Q.C.  The result... had to take the machine into an Apple store (about 35 miles away) and they admitted that the hard drive was failing.  They replaced it and so far so good.  We'll see.
